Question: ayk mysym aur anwda by astwryj anjn main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk fl tykst andayks aur ayk jn (aam alty andayks) andayks dono ksm kay asharyha sazay kay tarykay hain jo dayta bys sstm main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hain aur un ki mkhtlf khsawsayat hayn۔dwnwn kay mabyn akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: fl tykst andayks: ayk fl tykst andayks khasa tawr par dayta bys sstm main tykst srch salahaytwn kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔as ka astamal mkml mtn ki tlash ko bhatr bnanay aur tyza karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، js main mtn kay braay jsmwn main mkhsawsa alfaza ya fkray tlash karna shaml hawta haay۔fl tykst andayks aam tawr par dayta bys sstm main astamal hawtay hain jo kdrty zaban kay swalat ki taiyd karty hain ، jesay mzuamyn ، blagh pwsts ، ya dyghr mtny mwad ki tlash krna۔ fl tykst andayks ki klyd khsawsayat main shaml hayn: zaban sy aaghahay: fl tykst andayks zaban sy wakf hawskty hay ،as ka mtalb hay keh woh zaban sy mtalk khsawsayat ko mdnzar rakh saktay hain jesay wrda astymmngh ، astap wrda ko hatana ، aur mtaabkt ki drjha bndy۔ twknaizayshn: fl tykst andayks aam tawr par mtn ko asharyha bnatay hain ، aur isy anfrady alfaza ya shraita main twra dytay hayn۔as sy mkhsawsa alfaza ya fkray ki mwsar tlash aur mlap ki ajazat mlty haay۔wha ntaij ko apni mwjwdghy aur dyghr awaml ki bnyad par alfaza ko tfwyzu krsktay hain takha ntaij ki drjha bndy main mdd ki jaskay۔ tykst fyldaza main mhadwd: fl tykst andayks aam tawr par dayta bys tybl kay andr mkhsawsa tykst fyldaza par bnaiay jatay hain aur ghair tykstl dayta aksam par laghw nahin hawtay hayn۔: dusri taraf ، ayk jn andayks ، ayk aam mksad kay asharyha sazay ka dahanchha hay jo sirf mtn sy bahar mkhtlf ksm kay dayta kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha alty andayks ki ayk ksm hay jo pychydha aadad wa shmar ki aksam jesay arywn ، JSON dstawyzaat ، ya dyghr jama dayta dahanchay kay liye mwsar tlash aur astfsar ki ajazat dyty haay۔ jn andayks ki klyd khsawsayat main shaml hayn: jnrl mksad ki asharyha: jn asharyha wrstail hain aur hawsktay hain aur hawsktay hayn۔mtn sy bahar mkhtlf ksm kay dayta dahanchay ki asharyha kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay ary ، JSON ، ya saarf ki wzuahat shuda aksam۔wha un pychydha aadad wa shmar ki aksam kay liye mwsar tlash aur astfsar ki salahaytyn mhaya karty hayn۔ kabl astamal tlashy kay kam: jn asharyha tlashy kay kamwn ki ayk wsya rynj ki hamayt karty hain ، bshmwl kntynmnt ki tlashyn ، rynj kay swalat ، aur dyghr pychydha pysh ghwiwn ko asharyha shuda dayta ki ksm sy mkhsawsa haay۔fl tykst andayks kay braks ، jn andayks zaban sy mtalk mkhsawsa khsawsayat fraham nahin karty hain jesay astymngh ya mtaabkt ki drjha bndy۔wha bnyady tawr par sakhty ya pychydha aadad wa shmar ko mwsar andaza main trtyb denay aur bazayaft karnay sy mtalk hayn۔mtn ki tlash aur zaban sy mtalk khsawsayat aur mtaabkt ki drjha bndy fraham krty hay ، ayk jn andayks ayk aam mksad kay asharyha sazay ka dahanchha hay jo mtn sy bahar mkhtlf pychydha aadad wa shmar ki aksam ko snbhal sakta haay۔an asharyha kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur js ksm kay dayta ki aap ko asharyha aur tlash karnay ki zurwrt hay is par mnhasar haay۔

Question: ayk Btree aur haysh andayks main kya frk haay؟
Answer: aarzuy jdwl aur mstkl jdwl kay darmiyan bnyady frk un ki zandghy aur dayta bys sstm main astkamt main haay۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: aarzuy jdwl: ayk aarzuy jdwl ayk tybl hay jo sirf dayta bys syshn ya tranzaykshn ki mdt kay liye mwjwd haay۔yha antrmydayt ya aarzuy dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye bnaya aur astamal kya jata hay jo kesi khasa syshn ya lyn dyn sy mkhsawsa haay۔aarzuy jdwlyn ayk mkhsawsa syak wa sbak kay andr pychydha swalat ، antrmydayt kay ntaij kay syt ، ya aarzuy dayta hayra phyry kay l useful mfyd hayn۔ aarzuy jdwlwn ki klyd khsawsayat main shaml hayn: zandghy: jab syshn ya tranzaykshn shrwa hawta hay aur khud bkhwd ghra diya jata hay aur tbaha hawjata hay jab syshn main khud bkhwd aur tbaha hawjata haay۔ya lyn dyn khtm hawta haay۔wha ftart main aarzuy hain aur mwjwdha dayta bys knkshn sy aaghay brkrar nahin rhatay hayn۔wha dusray dayta bys syshnwn ya lyn dyn kay liye mriy ya kabl rsaiy nahin hain jab tak keh wazuha tawr par mshtrkha ya pas nah hawjaiay۔ dayta tnhaaiy: aarzuy jdwlyn dayta ko alag thlgh fraham krty hain ، mtalb hr syshn ya lyn dyn main aarzuy jdwl ki apni alag alag msaal hawskty haay۔ayk syshn ya tranzaykshn kay andr aarzuy jdwl par ki janay wali tbdylyan ya aapryshn dusray syshnwn ya lyn dyn main aarzuy jdwlwn ko mtasar nahin karty hayn۔ ayk mstkl jdwl: ayk mstkl ya mstkl jdwl kay tawr par bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk tybl hay jo dayta bys main brkrar rhata haay۔ayk hi syshn ya lyn dyn sy pray۔yha tawyl mdty astamal kay l data dayta ko mstkl tawr par zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، aur yeh mwjwdha syshn ya tranzaykshn kay akhttam kay bad bhi astfsar karnay ، ap dayt karnay ya hazaf karnay kay liye dstyab haay۔ mstkl jdwlwn ki klyd khsawsayat main shaml hayn: zandghy: mstkl jdwlwn ko dayta bys aydamnstrytrza kay zaryaha wazuha tawr par tkhlyk kya jata haay۔ya saarfyn aur is wkt tak mwjwd rahain jab tak keh woh wazuha tawr par ghra ya hazaf nah hawjaiyn۔wha mkhtlf dayta bys knkshn par brkrar rhatay hain aur mtadd syshnwn ya lyn dyn kay zaryaha astamal kay l available dstyab hayn۔ dayta astkamt: mstkl jdwl main zakhyrha shuda dayta dayta bys sstm kay dwbarha shrwa hony ya syshn ya tranzaykshn khtm hony kay bad bhi brkrar rhata haay۔aadad wa shmar paiydar hain aur kesi bhi wkt un tak rsaiy ya is main trmym ki jaskty haay۔ dayta shyirngh: mstkl jdwlyn aam tawr par mtadd saarfyn ، syshnwn ، ya dayta bys sstm main lyn dyn tak kabl rsaiy hawty hayn۔an ka astamal mshtrkha aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay js tak kesi drkhwast kay mkhtlf hasawn ya ayk sy zayada saarfyn kay zaryaha byk wkt tak rsaiy haasal karnay ya jwra twra karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ askyma taryf: mstkl jdwlwn main aksar ayk mtayn dahanchha ya askyma hawta hay ، js main kalm kay nam ، dayta ki aksam ، rkawtyn shaml hain ، awrasharyha.askyma zakhyrha shuda aadad wa shmar kay liye ayk mstkl dahanchha mhaya krta haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh aarzuy jdwlyn klyl almdty hain ، syshn ya lyn dyn kay andr aarzuy dayta astwryj aur hayra phyry kay liye astamal hony wali syshn sy mtalk mkhsawsa jdwlyn ، jabky mstkl jdwlyn syshn aur lyn dyn sy bahar brkrar rhaty hain ، aur mstkl tawr par dayta ko zakhyrha krty hayn۔tawyl mdty astamal aur mtadd saarfyn ya kesi ayply kyshn kay kuch hasawn main ashtrak kay l .۔

Question: fl tykst aur jn andayks main kya frk haay؟
Answer: aalmy aur mkamy aarzuy tybl kay darmiyan frk dayta bys sstm main un kay dairha kar aur mriyt main haay۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: aalmy aarzuy jdwl: ayk aalmy aarzuy jdwl ayk aarzuy jdwl hay jo dayta bys sstm kay andr mwjwd tamam syshnwn ya saarfyn kay liye dstyab aur mriy haay۔yha ayk bar dayta bys aydamnstrytr ya mnasb mraaat kay haaml saarf kay zaryaha tkhlyk kya gaya hay aur jab tak isy wazuha tawr par ghraya nahin jata haay۔taham ، aalmy aarzuy jdwl kay andr mwjwd aadad wa shmar syshn sy mtalk hayn۔ aalmy aarzuy jdwl ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: dairha kar: aalmy aarzuy jdwlyn dayta bys sstm kay andr mwjwd tamam syshnwn ya saarfyn kay liye mriy hayn۔mtadd syshn byk wkt aalmy aarzuy tybl main dayta tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain aur un main hayra phyry krsktay hayn۔ dayta tnhaaiy: agarcha tybl dahanchha mkhtlf syshnwn main mshtrkha hay ، lekin hr syshn main tybl kay andr apna apna njy dayta hawta haay۔ayk syshn kay zaryaha dakhl krdha ، ap dayt ، ya hazaf krdha aadad wa shmar ko dusray syshnwn sy alag thlgh kya jata hay ، aur ayk syshn main ki janay wali tbdylyan dusray syshnwn main mwjwd dayta ko mtasar nahin krty hayn۔taham ، aalmy aarzuy jdwl main zakhyrha shuda dayta aarzuy hay aur jab khud bkhwd aadad wa shmar dakhl karnay waly syshn ko khtm krdya jata haay۔ lwkl aarzuy jdwl: ayk mkamy aarzuy jdwl ayk aarzuy jdwl hay jo njy aur sirf syshn kay liye dkhaiy dyta hay jo isy tkhlyk krta haay۔yha ayk mkhsawsa syshn kay zaryaha tkhlyk kya gaya hay aur is syshn ki mdt kay liye mwjwd haay۔ayk bar syshn khtm hony kay bad ، mkamy aarzuy tybl ko khud bkhwd ghra diya jata hay aur isy dayta bys sstm sy hata diya jata haay۔ mkamy aarzuy tybl ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: dairha kar: mkamy aarzuy jdwlyn mkamy aur sirf syshn kay andr dkhaiy dyty hain jo inhain tkhlyk krty haay۔dwsray syshnza ya saarfyn mkamy aarzuy tybl tak rsaiy ya taaml nahin krsktay hayn۔ dayta tnhaaiy: aalmy aarzuy jdwlwn ki tarah ، hr syshn main mkamy aarzuy tybl main apna apna njy dayta hawta haay۔ayk syshn main tybl kay dayta main ki janay wali tbdylyan dusray syshnwn par asar andaza nahin hawty hain ، aur jab syshn khtm hawta hay tou aadad wa shmar khud bkhwd saaf hawjatay hayn۔jb syshn khtm hawta hay tou ghra diya jata haay۔wha ftart main aarzuy hain aur syshn ki zandghy sy aaghay nahin brahtay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، aalmy aarzuy jdwlwn ko dayta bys sstm kay andr mtadd syshnwn ya saarfyn kay darmiyan mshtrkha kya jata hay ، js sy byk wkt rsaiy ki ajazat hawty hay ، jabky mkamy aarzuy jdwlyn ayk hi syshn kay liye mkhsawsa hain ، aur yeh fraham karty hayn۔dayta tnhaaiy aur syshn ki staha ki nmaish۔

Question: aarzuy aur mstkl tybl main kya frk haay؟
Answer: trashay hoey tybl aur darap tybl kay byanat dono ko ays kyw ayl main dayta bys sy dayta ya pori jdwlwn ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh un kay tarza aml aur aapryshn ki had tak mkhtlf hayn۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: trnkyt tybl: tybl dahanchay ko brkrar rkhtay hoey tybl sy tamam ktaarwn ko hatanay kay liye trnkyt tybl ka byan astamal kya jata haay۔yha tybl kay andr mwjwd tamam dayta ko mؤsar tarykay sy hazaf krta hay lekin tybl ko hi brkrar rkhta haay۔trashay hoey jdwl kay byan ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: dayta ko hatana: tybl tybl tybl sy tamam ktaaryn hazaf krdyta hay ، js kay ntyjay main khaly tybl hawta haay۔tybl ka dahanchha ، bshmwl kalm ، rkawtyn ، asharyha jat ، aur mharkat ، bdla hoa haay۔ aspyda: trnkyt tybl aam tawr par tamam ktaarwn ko hatanay kay liye hazaf karnay sy kahain zayada tyza hawta hay ، kywnkha yeh hr saf kay liye anfrady tawr par hazaf karnay wali karrwaiywn ko pyda nahin krta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، yeh jdwl sy wabstha dayta safhaat ko khtm krta hay ، js sy dayta ko door karnay ka ayk zayada mwsar tarykha fraham hawta haay۔ transkshnl asar: trnkyt tybl aam tawr par anfrady saf ko hazaf karnay kay tawr par lagh un nahin hawta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh isy lyn dyn main waps nahin laya jaskta haay۔aapryshn ko day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) byan smjha jata hay ، nah keh day aym ayl (dayta hayra phyry zaban) ka byan۔ pysh ksh: tybl tybl ko tybl par mnasb mraaat ki zurwrt hawty haay۔aam tawr par ، saarfyn ko tybl par hazaf karnay waly astkamt ki zurwrt hawty hay ، nyza tybl par mushtamil askyma par bdlaؤ asthakak ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ darap tybl: darap tybl ka byan ayk tybl ko mkml tawr par hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js main is ki sakht ، dayta ، rkawtyn ، asharyha jat ، aur shaml hayn۔mharkatyha dayta bys sy mstkl tawr par pori tybl ko khtm krta haay۔darap tybl byan ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: tybl hatana: darap tybl poray tybl ko hazaf krta hay ، bshmwl is ki sakht aur is sy wabstha tamam dayta۔yha tybl ki taryf aur kesi bhi asharyha ، rkawtwn ، ya tybl sy wabstha mharkat ko door krta haay۔tmam dayta aur tybl sy mtalkha ashyaa mstkl tawr par khw jati hayn۔lhazaa ، darap tybl ka astamal karty wkt ahatyata ka astamal karna bohat zurwry hay ، kywnkha aapryshn ko kaladm karnay kay liye koi blt un mykanzam mwjwd nahin haay۔ tranzaykshnl asar: trnkyt tybl ki tarah ، darap tybl ko bhi day day ayl ka byan smjha jata haay۔yha aam tawr par phansy denay sy pehlay lyn dyn ka artkab krta hay ، yany isy lyn dyn main waps nahin laya jaskta haay۔aam tawr par ، saarfyn ko tybl par darap asthakak aur tybl par mushtamil askyma par tbdyl shuda asthakak ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، tybl tybl tybl ki sakht ko brkrar rkhtay hoey tamam ktaar ko ayk tybl sy hatata hay ، jabky darap tybl mstkl tawr par pori tybl aur is sy wabstha ashyaa ko hata dyta haay۔dayta bys saytrashnay wali tybl tyza hay aur anfrady hazafwn ko lagh un nahin krty hay ، lekin isy lyn dyn main waps nahin laya jaskta haay۔darap tybl nakabl wapsy hay aur pori tybl ko hatata haay۔

Question: aalmy aur mkamy aarzuy tybl main kya frk haay؟
Answer: bwlyn aur tnyint dayta ki aksam dono mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main bwlyn ya mntaky akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔dwnwn kay mabyn akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: bwlyn: bwlyn dayta ki ksm ayk mntaky dayta ki ksm hay jo sahayha ya ghalat akdar ki nmaindghy krty haay۔yha ayk mayary ays kyw ayl dayta taip hay js ki taiyd bohat sy dayta bys sstm kay zaryaha ki jati haay۔bwlyn dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: akdar: bwlyn dayta ki ksm ki do mmknha akdar hawskty hayn: sahayha ya ghlta۔kchh dayta bys sstm mtbadl nmaindghywn ka astamal krsktay hain jesay 1 aur ghalat kay liye 0 kay liye 1 ، lekin tsawr ayk hi rhata haay۔ saiza: bwlyn kdr ka saiza aam tawr par sstm par mnhasar hawta hay ، lekin is main aam tawr par thwray mkdar main astwryj hawta haay۔yha ghair zurwry awwr hayda kay baghair bwlyn akdar ki mwsar andaza main nmaindghy karnay aur astwr karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔as ka astamal mntaky tasarat ، haalat aur bwlyn aapryshnza jesay aur ، aur ، aur nhayn۔ tynyint: tainnt dayta taip ayk antyjr dayta taip hay jo aam tawr par thwray mkdar main astwryj par kbzuha krta haay۔yha aksar kesi khasa had main addy akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔tyny ant dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: akdar: tynyynt dayta ki ksm aam tawr par chhwtay antyjr akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، aam tawr par -128 sy 127 ya 0 sy 255 ki had myn۔ dayta bys sstm aur is kay lhaaza sy ayn mtaabk had mkhtlf hawskty haay۔tainnt dayta ki ksm ki dstkhta shuda ya dstkhta shuda nwayt۔ saiza: tyny ant wylyw ka astwryj saiza aam tawr par 1 bait ya 8 bts hawta haay۔as sy chhwtay antyjr akdar kay mwsar astwryj ki ajazat mlty haay۔ ywzaj: agarcha tnyynt dayta ki ksm ko bwlyn akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، lekin yeh bwlyn dayta ki ayk srshar nahin haay۔as kay bjaiay ، yeh ayk amwmy mksad kay addy aadad wa shmar ki ksm hay jo sirf sch ya ghalat sy bahar addy akdar ki ayk wsya rynj ko mhafwza krskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، bwlyn ayk mntaky aadad wa shmar ki ksm hay jo khasa tawr par sahayha ya ghalat akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jabky tainnt ayk add aadad wa shmar haay۔aam tawr par chhwty addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay lekin is ka astamal bwlyn akdar ki nmaindghy kay liye bhi kya jaskta haay۔bwlyn mntaky akdar kay l a ayk zayada tasaraty aur lymanky tawr par mnasb nmaindghy fraham krta hay ، jabky tainnt ayk aam mksad kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm hay jo addy akdar ki ayk wsya rynj ko mhafwza krskty haay۔

Question: ayk chhwta sa tybl aur darap tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: INT aur BIGINT dayta ki aksam dono ko mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main addy akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk un akdar ki had main hay jo woh zakhyrha krsktay hayn۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: INT: INT (ya antyjr) dayta ki ksm ayk mayary antyjr dayta taip hay jo aam tawr par 4 baits ya 32 bts astwryj par kbzuha krty haay۔INT dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: wylyw rynj: INT dayta ki ksm ayk dstkhta shuda INT (32 bt nmaindghy frzu karty hawiay) kay liye tkryba -2.1 blyn sy 2.1 blyn ki had main addy akdar ko zakhyrha krskty haay۔dayta bys sstm aur INT dayta ki ksm ki dstkhta shuda ya dstkhta shuda nwayt kay lhaaza sy ktaay had kdray mkhtlf hawskty haay۔ astwryj saiza: ayk INT kdr aam tawr par astwryj kay 4 baits (32 bts) par kbzuha krty haay۔yha taay shuda astwryj saiza braay add aadad wa shmar ki aksam kay mkablay main zayada kmpykt bnata haay۔ mymwry ka astamal: chwnkha INT main zakhyrha karnay ka saiza chhwta hay ، lhazaa yeh braay antyjr dayta ki aksam kay mkablay main kam mymwry astamal krta haay۔yha aam tawr par is wkt astamal kya jata hay jab mtalwbha kdr ki had INT dayta ki ksm ki hadwd main aaty haay۔ byghnt: bghynt dayta ki ksm ayk twsya shuda antyjr dayta ki ksm hay jo INT kay mkablay main ayk bray kdr ki had fraham krty haay۔yha aam tawr par 8 baits ya 64 bts astwryj par kbzuha krta haay۔bghynt dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: wylyw rynj: bghynt dayta ki ksm ant kay mkablay main antyjr akdar ko nmayan tawr par bray had main astwr krskty haay۔yha dstkhta shuda bghnt kay l approximately tkryba -9.2 kwintylyn sy 9.2 kwintylyn (18 handsay) ki had main akdar ka anakad krskta haay۔ayk bar phir ، dayta bys sstm aur bghynt dayta ki ksm ki dstkhta shuda ya dstkhta shuda nwayt kay lhaaza sy ayn mtaabk had mkhtlf hawskty haay۔ astwryj saiza: ayk bray kymt main aam tawr par astwryj kay 8 baits (64 bts) par kbzuha hawta haay۔astwryj ka braa saiza antyjr akdar ki wsya rynj ko zakhyrha karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ mymwry ka astamal: braay astwryj kay saiza ki wjha sy INT kay mkablay main bghnt ko zayada mymwry ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha aam tawr par astamal kya jata hay jab mtalwbha kymt ki had INT dayta ki ksm ki had sy tjawza krty haay۔ khlasaha ، INT ayk mayary antyjr dayta taip hay js ki kymt tkryba -2.1 blyn sy 2.1 blyn (32 bt) hay ، js main 4 baits par kbzuha kya jata haay۔astwryjbghynt ayk twsyay antyjr dayta taip hay js ki bray kymt tkryba -9.2 kwintylyn sy 9.2 kwintylyn (64 bt) hay ، js main 8 baits astwryj par kbzuha kya gaya haay۔INT aur BIGINT kay darmiyan antkhab kesi mkhsawsa sawrthaal kay liye drkar mkhsawsa kdr ki had par mnhasar haay۔

Question: ayk mntkhb * aur mntkhb kalm_ nam kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: tarykh aur dayta taim dayta ki aksam mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main tarykhwn aur awkat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk sahat sy mtalk ki staha main hay jo woh fraham karty hayn۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: tarykh: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm kesi bhi wkt kay jzaw kay baghair tarykhwn ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: sahat sy mtalk: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm sal ، mhaynha aur dn ki malwmat ko astwr krty hay ، jo dn ki staha par sahat sy mtalk fraham krty haay۔as main kesi bhi wkt ki malwmat jesay ghhntay ، mnt ، ya syknda۔ farmyt shaml nahin haay: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ko aam tawr par mayary shkl main pysh kya jata hay ، jesay 'YYYY-MM-DD' (jysay ، '2023-06-23'). saarf: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm aam tawr par astamal hawty hay jab aap ko kesi bhi wabstha wkt ki kdr kay baghair tarykhwn ko zakhyrha karnay aur jwranay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha un ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn hay jo bnyady tawr par tarykhwn sy nmttay hain ، jesay salghrha ، wakaat ، ya shydawlngh۔ dayt taim: dayt taim dayta ki ksm tarykh aur awkat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay ، js main tarykh aur wkt kay ajzaaa dono shaml hayn۔dayt taim dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: sahat sy mtalk: dayt taim dayta taip sal ، mhaynha ، dn ، ghhntay ، mnt aur syknda main astwr krta hay ، jo aaly staha ki sahat sy mtalk fraham krta haay۔as main tarykh aur wkt dono ki malwmat shaml hayn۔ farmyt: dayt taim dayta ki ksm aam tawr par ayk mkhsawsa shkl main nmaindghy ki jati hay ، jesay 'YYYY-MM-DD HH: MI: SS' (jysay ، '2023-06-23 15:30:45 '). astamal: dayt taim dayta ki ksm aam tawr par is wkt astamal ki jati hay jab aap ko tarykh aur wkt dono ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay aur un main hayra phyry karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha un ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn hay js kay liye trykngh wakaat ya srghrmywn ki zurwrt hawty hay jo wkt kay mkhsawsa mkamat par paiay jatay hayn۔ yeh bat kabl kdr hay keh tarykh aur dayt taim dayta ki mkhsawsa had aur tarza aml aap dayta bys sstm kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hawskta hay js ka aap astamal krrhaay hayn۔kchh dayta bys sstm main tarykh aur wkt ki nmaindghy kay l alternative mtbadl ya zayada ayn mtaabk dayta ki aksam hawskty hain ، jesay taim astymp ya dayt taim 2۔mry main ، tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm sirf tarykh kay jzaw ko astwr krty hay ، jo dn ki staha par sahat sy mtalk fraham krty haay۔dayt taim dayta taip tarykh aur wkt dono ajzaaa ko zakhyrha krta hay ، js sy syknda tak aaly staha ki sahat sy mtalk fraham ki jati haay۔tarykh aur dayt taim kay darmiyan antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hay keh aya aap ko sirf tarykhwn ki nmaindghy karnay ki zurwrt hay ya apni drkhwast ya dayta bys main dono tarykhwn aur awkat۔

Question: jahan shk aur ayk shk ki shk kay darmiyan frk haay؟
Answer: wkt aur taim astymp dayta ki aksam ko mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main wkt sy mtalk malwmat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk tfsayl aur lchk ki staha main hay jo woh fraham karty hayn۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: wkt: wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm kesi tarykh kay jzaw kay baghair wkt ki akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: sahat sy mtalk: taim dayta taip astwrza ghhntay ، mnt ، syknda aur akhtyary tawr par ayk syknda kay mkhtlf hasa .wn ko astwr krta haay۔yha dn kay ayk mkhsawsa wkt ki nmaindghy krta hay ، lekin kesi bhi wabstha tarykh ki malwmat kay bghyr۔ farmyt: wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ko aam tawr par ayk mkhsawsa shkl main pysh kya jata hay ، jesay 'HH: MI: SS' (jysay ، '15: 30: 45 ')۔astamal: wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm aam tawr par astamal hawty hay jab aap ko kesi khasa tarykh sy aazaad wkt ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay aur jwranay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha un ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay jo shydawlngh ، mdt kay hasab ktab ، ya wakaat kay wkt sy nmttay hayn۔ taim astymp: taim astymp dayta ki ksm ayk sath tarykh aur wkt ki akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔as main tarykh aur wkt dono ajzaaa shaml hain ، jo aaly staha ki tfsayl aur lchk fraham karty hayn۔taim astymp dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: sahat sy mtalk: taim astymp dayta taip astwrza nah sirf tarykh aur wkt ، blkha akhtyary tawr par jzawy syknda bhi shaml hayn۔yha wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm sy zayada drst wkt ki malwmat pysh krta haay۔ farmyt: taim astymp dayta ki ksm ko aam tawr par ayk mkhsawsa shkl main pysh kya jata hay ، jesay 'YYYY-MM-DD HH: MI: SS' (jysay ، '2023-06-23 15: 30: 45 '). astamal: taim astymp dayta ki ksm aam tawr par is wkt astamal ki jati hay jab aap ko zayada sy zayada sahat sy mtalk tarykh aur wkt ki dono akdar ko zakhyrha karnay aur jwranay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha un ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn hay jn kay liye trykngh wakaat ki zurwrt hawty hay ، tranzaykshn taim astymp ko astwr karna ، ya tarykhy trtyb ko brkrar rkhna۔taim zawnza aur taim zawn kay tbadlwn sy nmtnay kay liay۔ khlasaha main ، wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm kesi tarykh ki malwmat kay baghair wkt ki akdar ki nmaindghy krty hay ، jabky taim astymp dayta ki ksm zayada sy zayada sahat sy mtalk aur lchk fraham krty haay۔wkt aur taim astymp kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ya dayta bys ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، chahaay aap ko sirf wkt ki akdar ki nmaindghy karnay ki zurwrt ho ya tarykh aur wkt dono ki akdar۔

Question: kesi ghrwp kay zaryaha aur ayk alag byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main wkt sy mtalk malwmat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye sal aur tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam ka astamal kya jata haay۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk tfsayl ki staha aur un ki zaat ki mkhsawsa malwmat main haay۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: sal: sal kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm brswn ko astynda astwn akdar ki haysayt sy nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔sal kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: sahat sy mtalk: sal kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm sirf sal kay jzaw ko char handswn ki kymt kay tawr par astwr krty hay (jysay ، '2023')۔as main kesi bhi mhaynay ya dn ki malwmat shaml nahin haay۔ ywzaj: sal kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm aam tawr par is wkt astamal hawty hay jab aap ko kesi khasa tarykh ya wkt sy aazaad salwn ko zakhyrha karnay aur jwra twra karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha un ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay jo bnyady tawr par sal sy mtalk aadad wa shmar sy nmttay hain ، jesay tarykhy wakaat ، kapy rait ki tarykhyn ، ya mmbrshp ki myaad khtm hony waly sal۔ tarykh: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ko kylndar ki mkhsawsa tarykhwn ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: sahat sy mtalk: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm sal ، mhaynha aur dn kay ajzaaa ko astwr krty hay ، jo tarykh ki mkml kymt fraham krty haay۔yha kylndar par wkt kay ayk khasa nktaha ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ farmyt: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ko aam tawr par ayk mkhsawsa shkl main pysh kya jata hay ، jesay 'yyyy-mm-dd' (jysay ، '2023-06-23')۔ astamal: tarykh: di tarykh:jb aap ko sal ، mhaynha aur dn ki malwmat kay sath mkhsawsa tarykhwn ko zakhyrha karnay aur jwra twra karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou aam tawr par dayta ki ksm astamal ki jati haay۔yha un ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn hay js kay liye trykngh wakaat ، nzaam alawkat ، ya aarzuy aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay ki zurwrt hawty hay js main ayk mkml tarykh ki nmaindghy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، sal kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm sirf sal kay jzaw ko char handswn ki kymt kay tawr par astwr krty hay ، jabky tarykh ka dayta taip sal main astwr krta haay۔، mhaynha aur dn kay ajzaaa ، tarykh ki ayk mkml kymt fraham karty hayn۔sal aur tarykh kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ya dayta bys ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، chahaay aap ko astynda salwn ki nmaindghy karnay ki zurwrt ho ya kylndar ki mkml tarykhyn۔

Question: andrwny shmwlyt aur baien bazaw main shaml hony main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ENUM aur syt dayta ki aksam ko mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main akdar ka ayk mkrrha syt astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk is tarah hay js tarah sy woh mtadd antkhabwn ko snbhaltay hain aur un ki mmknha akdar ki tadad jo woh zakhyrha krsktay hayn۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: ENUM: ENUM dayta ki ksm akdar ki pehlay sy taay shuda fharst sy ayk kymt ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔aynwm dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: kdr ka antkhab: ENUM kay sath ، aap akdar kay pehlay sy taay shuda syt sy sirf ayk kdr mntkhb krsktay hayn۔tybl tkhlyk kay doran akdar ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، aur aap un akdar main sy ayk ko hr saf kay liye mntkhb krsktay hayn۔ kdrwn ki tadad: ENUM dayta bys sstm par mnhasar hay ، aam tawr par kuch drjn ya is sy kam tak mhadwd kdrwn ki tadad ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔yha un haalat kay l suitable mwzawn hay jahan mmknha akdar ki achhy tarah sy wzuahat aur mhadwd haw۔ astwryj: aynwm kalm kay liye drkar astwryj ka anhasaar mmknha akdar ki tadad par hawta haay۔yha ayk kmpykt nmaindghy ka astamal krta hay ، aam tawr par 1 ya 2 baits par kbzuha krta hay ، alag alag akdar ki tadad par mnhasar haay۔ syt: syt dayta ki ksm akdar ki pehlay sy taay shuda fharst sy mtadd akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔syt dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: kdr ka antkhab: syt kay sath ، aap akdar kay pehlay sy taay shuda syt sy safr ، ayk ، ya ayk sy zayada akdar mntkhb krsktay hayn۔har kymt ka aazaadanha tawr par slwk kya jata hay ، aur aap hr saf kay liye akdar ka koi mjmwaha mntkhb krsktay hayn۔ kdrwn ki tadad: syt aynwm kay mkablay main bray tadad main kdrwn ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔yha aam tawr par astamal kya jata hay jab aap ko akdar kay ayk mtayn krdha syt sy mtadd antkhab ki ajazat denay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ astwryj: syt kalm kay liye drkar astwryj mmknha akdar ki tadad par mnhasar hawta haay۔yha ayk kmpykt nmaindghy ka astamal krta hay ، aam tawr par 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، ya 8 baits par kbzuha krta hay ، js main alag alag akdar ki tadad par mnhasar haay۔ khlasaha main ، aynwm ka astamal akdar kay ayk mtayn krdha syt sy ayk hi kymt ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky syt astamal hawta haay۔akdar kay pehlay sy taay shuda syt sy mtadd antkhab ko zakhyrha krna۔aynwm nsbta small kam tadad main akdar ko zakhyrha krskta hay ، jabky syt bray tadad main antkhab ko snbhal sakta haay۔aynwm aur syt kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hay keh aya aap ko ayk hi kymt ko zakhyrha karnay ki zurwrt hay ya akdar kay pehlay sy taay shuda syt sy mtadd antkhab ki ajazat haay۔

Question: byrwny shmwlyt aur sahayha shmwlyt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: JSON (jawa askrpt aabjykt asharay) aur XML (aykstynsybl mark ap zaban) dayta ki aksam ko mkhtlf shklwn main sakhty dayta ko astwr aur nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: JSON: JSON ayk halka phlka dayta antrchynj farmyt hay jo dayta syrylaizayshn aur astwryj kay liye wsya pymanay par astamal hawta haay۔JSON dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: dahanchha: JSON klydy kdr kay jwraay ، safwn aur ghhrylw ashyaa ka astamal karty hoey drjha bndy kay dahanchay main dayta ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yha jawa askrpt nhaw par mbny hay aur aam tawr par wyb ayply kyshnza aur APIs main astamal hawta haay۔ prahnay ki ahalyt: JSON ko ansany prahnay kay kabl aur smjhnay main aasan bnanay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔as main sydhay sydhay nhaw ka astamal kya gaya hay js main ashya aur mrba brykt kay liye ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany kay sath astamal kya jata haay۔ dayta ki aksam: JSON aadad wa shmar ki kiy bnyady aksam ki hamayt krta hay ، js main dawr ، nmbr ، bwlynza ، ary ، ashyaa aur kaladm shaml hayn۔as main zayada pychydha aadad wa shmar ki aksam jesay tarykhwn ya bainry dayta kay liye blt un spwrt nahin haay۔ saarf: JSON aam tawr par sstm kay mabyn dayta aykschynj ، trtyb ki trtybat ko astwr karnay ، API kay rdaml ki nmaindghy karnay ، aur nym sakhtha aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha khasa tawr par wyb dawylpmnt aur jawa askrpt par mbny ayply kyshnza main mshhawr haay۔XML dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: sakht: XML drkhtwn ki tarah kay dahanchay main trtyb dyiay gaye tygh aur anasar ka astamal karty hoey dayta ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yha aadad wa shmar ki ghhwnsla aur drjha bndy ki tnzaym ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ryday ayblty: XML ko ansany prahnay kay kabl aur mshyn prahnay kay kabl dono kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔aadad wa shmar kay baray main azuafy malwmat fraham karnay kay liye anasar aur safat ki wzuahat kay liye yeh tygh khwlnay aur band karnay ka astamal krta haay۔ dayta ki aksam: XML main pehlay sy taay shuda dayta ki ksm nahin haay۔yha aadad wa shmar ko mtn kay tawr par alaj krta hay aur saarf ki wzuahat shuda anasar aur safat ki mkhtlf aksam kay aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ saarf: XML aam tawr par dstawyza astwryj ، dayta antrchynj ، knfyghryshn failwn ، aur sakhty aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk wsya pymanay par apnaya hoa mayar hay aur mkhtlf prwghramngh zabanwn aur plyt farmza main astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، JSON ayk halka phlka dayta antrchynj farmyt hay jo klydy kdr kay jwraay aur safwn ka astamal krta hay ، jo bnyady tawr par wyb ayply kyshnza main dayta aykschynj aur astwryj kay liye astamal hawta haay۔XML ayk mark ap zaban hay jo drkhtwn ki tarah kay dahanchay main trtyb dyiay gaye tyghza aur anasar ka astamal krty hay ، jo dstawyzay zakhyrha karnay aur sakhty aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye wsya pymanay par astamal hawty haay۔JSON aur XML kay mabyn antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat ، mwjwdha nzaamwn kay sath mtaabkt ، aur js mahawlyaty nzaam kay sath aap kam kar rahay hain is par mnhasar haay۔

Question: ywnyn aur ywnyn kay tamam byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: bainry aur wrbry dayta ki aksam ko bainry dayta ko mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk zakhyrha shuda dayta ki lmbaiy ko snbhalnay kay tarykay main haay۔akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: bainry: bainry dayta taip fksda lmbaiy bainry dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔bainry dayta taip ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: lmbaiy: bainry dayta ki ksm ko tybl tkhlyk kay doran ayk mkrrha lmbaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh bainry kalm main mhafwza krdha hr kymt ki lmbaiy ayk hi hawghy۔ astwryj: bainry dayta ko aadad wa shmar ki lmbaiy sy ktaa nzar ، jghha ki ayk mkrrha mkdar ka astamal karty hoey mhafwza kya jata haay۔aghr mkhsawsa lmbaiy n hay tou ، hr kymt astwryj kay n baits par kbzuha kray ghy۔as kay braks ، agar fraham krdha kymt mkhsawsa lmbaiy sy zayada lmby hay tou ، is ko mkhsawsa lmbaiy ko ft karnay kay liye chhwta kya jaye gha۔ wrbnry: wrbry dayta ki ksm mtghyr lmbaiy bainry dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔wrbry dayta taip ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: lmbaiy: wrbry dayta ki ksm mtghyr lmbaiy kay bainry dayta ko zakhyrha karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh wrbry kalm main zakhyrha shuda hr kymt ki lmbaiy mkhtlf hawskty haay۔ astwryj: wrbnry dayta jghha ki ayk mkrrha mkdar ki bjaiay aadad wa shmar ki asal lmbaiy ka astamal karty hoey mhafwza kya jata haay۔mtalwbha astwryj ka anhasaar aadad wa shmar ki lmbaiy par hawta haay۔ tzaiyn wa aaraish: bainry kay braks ، wrbnry dayta ko chhwta nahin krta hay jo mkhsawsa lmbaiy sy zayada haay۔yha mkhtlf lmbaiy ki akdar ko zakhyrha krskta hay ، kalm kay liye mkhsawsa zayada sy zayada lmbaiy tk۔ khlasaha ، bainry fksda lmbaiy bainry dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jahan hr kymt ki lmbaiy ayk hi hawty haay۔as kay liye astwryj ki ayk mkrrha mkdar ki zurwrt hawty hay aur mkhsawsa lmbaiy sy mlnay kay liye pyda ya trashay hoey akdar ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mtghyr lmbaiy kay bainry dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye wrbry ka astamal kya jata hay ، js sy mkhtlf lmbaiy ki kdr hawty haay۔yha aadad wa shmar ki asal lmbaiy ka astamal krta hay aur un akdar ko chhwta nahin krta hay jo mkhsawsa lmbaiy sy tjawza karty hayn۔bainry aur wrbry kay darmiyan antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hay keh aya aap ko apnay mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay kay liye fksda lmbaiy ya mtghyr lmbaiy bainry astwryj ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: ayk ghnty aur rkm kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: langh blb aur langh tykst dayta ki aksam ko mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main baltrtyb braay bainry aur tykst dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk is ksm kay aadad wa shmar main hay js ko woh mhafwza krsktay hayn۔yhaan akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha haay: langh blwb: langh blwb dayta ki ksm bray bainry ashyaa (blbs) ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔langh blwb dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: dayta ki ksm: langh blwb khasa tawr par bainry dayta ko astwr karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jesay tsaawyr ، aadayw failyn ، wydayw failyn ، ya bainry dayta ki koi dusri ksm۔dayta bys sstm par mnhasar haay۔ astwryj par mnhasar haay۔braay tykst dayta ko zakhyrha kryn۔langh tykst dayta ki ksm ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: dayta ki ksm: langh tykst khasa tawr par braay mtn kay aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jesay tawyl dstawyzaat ، mzuamyn ، ya kesi bhi tarah ki lmby tykst mwad۔dayta bys sstm par anhasaar karty hoey zayada sy zayada 4 ghygha baits (jy by) ka saiza۔ ankwdangh: langh tykst dayta aam tawr par ayk mkhsawsa kryktr ankwdangh ، jesay UTF-8 ya UTF-16 main mhafwza kya jata hay ، takha ksayr lsany mtn ki hamayt ki jaskay aur krdar ki nmaindghy ko mhafwza kya jaskay۔ astwryj: langh tykst tykst dayta ko harfwn ki trtyb kay tawr par astwr krta hay ، js main mtn ki asal dahanchay aur mwad ko mhafwza rkhtay hawiay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh langh blwb bray bainry ashyaa ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jabky langh tykst braay tykstykl dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔langh blwb bainry failwn ، jesay tsaawyr ya wydaywza ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mwzawn hay ، jabky langh tykst lmbay lmbay mtn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mwzawn haay۔langh blwb aur langh tykst kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hawta hay keh aap ko apnay mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay main zakhyrha karnay ki zurwrt hay ، chahaay woh bainry dayta ho ya mtny mwad۔

Question: zayada sy zayada aur ayk mnt kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: blab aur tykst dayta ki aksam ko mkhtlf dayta bys sstm main baltrtyb bainry aur tykst dayta ki bray mkdar main zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an kay darmiyan bnyady frk is ksm
