main bhi aadad wa shmar mstkl rhayn۔aap ko myzawn kay mabyn talkat ki wzuahat karnay aur ryfrnshnl salmyt ko nafza karnay ki ajazat dyna۔ karkrdghy: INNODB dono prahnay aur lkhnay ki karrwaiywn kay sath achhy karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krta hay ، js sy yeh amwmy mksad ki ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn hawta hay js main dayta ki salmyt ، tranzaykshn spwrt ، aur hum aahanghy kay kntrwl ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ khlasaha yeh aasan haay۔awr prahnay sy bhary kam kay bwjh kay l suitable mwzawn hay jahan tranzaykshn spwrt aur dayta ki salmyt aham nahin haay۔INNODB zayada trky yaftha hay ، jo tranzaykshn spwrt ، hum aahanghy kntrwl ، krysh ki bazayaby ، ghair mlky klydy rkawtwn aur bhatr dayta ki salmyt ki frahamy haay۔yha zayada tr amwmy mksad kay ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn hay jahan dayta ki salmyt aur wshwsnyyta anthaaiy zurwry haay۔dwnwn kay mabyn antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat ، tranzaykshn spwrt ki zurwrt ، hum aahanghy par kabw panay ، aur karkrdghy aur khsawsayat kay mabyn tjarty talkat par mnhasar haay۔

Question: char aur wrchr dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk BTREE andayks aur ayk haysh andayks do mkhtlf ksm kay andayks hain jo dayta bys sstm main astamal hawtay hain ، hr ayk apni khsawsayat aur astamal kay maamlat kay sath۔dwnwn kay mabyn akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: BTREE andayks: dahanchha: ayk BTREE (mtwazan drkht) andayks khud twazan waly drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay par mbny hay ، aam tawr par bainry drkht ya B+ drkht ki tarah ayk ksm۔yha ayk trtyb shuda trtyb main andayks andrajat ka ahatmam krta hay ، js sy yeh rynj par mbny swalat aur chhantnay kay kamwn kay l effice mwsar hawta haay۔ aardarngh: by ty aar ay andayks main akdar ko ayk mkhsawsa trtyb main mhafwza kya jata hay ، js sy mwazanha aaprytrza ki bnyad par mwsar tlash ki jaskty hay (jysay ، is sy zayada ،as sy kam ، msawat)۔yha msawat aur adm msawat ki tlash dono ki hamayt krta haay۔ bharhaal۔wha aysay mnzarnamwn kay liye mnasb hain jahan aadad wa shmar ki tksym ghair mtwka hay ya jab lchkdar tlash ki salahaytwn ki zurwrt haw۔ dask par mbny: BTREE andayks aam tawr par dask par mbny hawtay hain ، yany woh is ki bjaiay saanwy astwryj (haarda dask) par mhafwza hawtay hayn۔yadasht.as sy dask ki jghha kay mwsar astamal ki ajazat mlty hay aur braay daytasyts ko snbhal sakta haay۔ mlty kalm andayksngh: by ty ay ay andayks ayk sy zayada kalmwn par bnaiy jaskty hay ، js sy mtadd mayarat ki bnyad par mwsar astfsar ki ajazat di jaskty hay (jysay ، dono "frst nam" aur "aakhry_ nam" par ayk andayks۔) .hash andayks: sakht: ayk haysh andayks andayks main mkhsawsa mkamat par andayks akdar ko nkshha bnanay kay liye haysh andayks ka astamal krta haay۔as sy asharyha shuda kymt aur is kay mkam kay mabyn braha rast nkshha sazay pyda hawty hay ، js sy tyza rftar tlash hawty haay۔taham ، woh rynj par mbny swalat ya chhantnay wali karrwaiywn ki mwsar tarykay sy hamayt nahin karty hayn۔ aykwyty ki tlashyn: haysh andayks msawat ki tlash (ayn mtaabk mych) kay liye bhatr bnaya jata hay lekin adm msawat ki tlash ya rynj kay swalat kay l suitable mwzawn nahin hayn۔ mymwry par mbny: haysh andayks aam tawr par mymwry hayn-mbny ، mtalb woh dask kay bjaiay mymwry main mhafwza hayn۔as sy anthaaiy tyza nzar daalnay ki ajazat mlty hay lekin andayks kay saiza ko dstyab mymwry tak mhadwd krdya jata haay۔ snghl kalm andayksngh: haysh andayks aam tawr par ayk hi kalm par bnaiay jatay hayn۔jb woh is mkhsawsa kalm par ayn mtaabk mych kay swalat kay sath astamal hawtay hain tou woh sab sy zayada mwsar hawtay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، ayk BTREE andayks wsya pymanay par astfsar kay nmwnwn kay liye mwzawn hay ، msawat aur rynj dono swalat ki hamayt krta hay ، aur braay daytasyts ko snbhal sakta haay۔dwsry taraf ، ayk haysh andayks ko ayn mtaabk mych (msawat) ki tlash kay l optim bhatr bnaya gaya hay ، mymwry par mbny hay ، aur snghl kalm andayksngh kay liye sab sy zayada mwsar haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa astfsar kay nmwnwn ، dayta ki tksym ، aur karkrdghy ki zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔

Question: bnyady klyd aur ayk anwkhy klyd main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk fl tykst andayks aur ayk jn (aam alty andayks) andayks do mkhtlf ksm kay asharyha jat hain jo dayta bys sstm main astamal hawtay hain ، hr ayk apni khsawsayat aur astamal kay maamlat kay sath۔dwnwn kay mabyn akhtlafat ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: fl tykst andayks: tykst srch: ayk fl tykst andayks khasa tawr par tykst dayta par mkml tykst srch aapryshnza kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔yha mtn kay braay jsmwn main alfaza ya fkray ki mwsar tlash ki ajazat dyta haay۔ zaban sy mtalk mkhsawsa: fl tykst andayks aam tawr par zaban sy mtalk mkhsawsa hawtay hain ، yany woh ayk mkhsawsa zaban ya zabanwn kay syt kay l optim bhatr hawtay hayn۔wha zaban sy mtalk lfza astymngh ، astap alfaza ، aur dyghr lsany thafzaat ko mdnzar rkhtay hayn۔ mychngh: fl tykst andaykss mtaabkt ki drjha bndy kay alghwrthm par mbny mmasal karkrdghy ka mzaaharha karty hain ، jesay alfaza ki tadd ، krbt ، aur mtn kay andr tlash ki shraita ki mwjwdghy ko mdnzar rkhtay hayn۔.kyry nhaw: fl tykst andayks aaly drjay ki astfsar kay nhaw ki hamayt karty hain ، js main pychydha tlash kay nmwnwn ki ajazat hawty hay ، bshmwl bwlyn aaprytrza (awr ، ya ، nhayn) ، wailda karda ki tlashyn ، aur fkray ki tlashyn۔ayk jdwl main ، is kalm kay andr mwsar tlash ko chalw krna۔yha ayk fl tykst andayks jesay tykst dayta tak hi mhadwd nahin haay۔mtadd kalmwn par tkhlyk kya jaskta hay ، js main mtadd kalmwn par phyla hoa jama dayta ki aksam ki asharyha sazay aur mwsar astfsar ki ajazat di jaskty haay۔jama aksam par pychydha karwaiyan۔ dayta aksam: jn asharyha ko mkhtlf ksm kay dayta ki aksam kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، mtn tak hi mhadwd nhayn۔wha wrstail hain aur mkhtlf ksm kay dayta dahanchay kay mtaabk dahal saktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، ayk fl tykst andayks khasa tawr par tykst dayta par mkml tykst srch aapryshnza kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jo zaban sy mtalk mkhsawsa thafzaat aur mtaabkt ki drjha bndy kay liye bhatr haay۔yha jdyd astfsar nhaw ki hamayt krta hay aur yeh tykst kalmwn main tlash kay l suitable mwzawn haay۔dwsry taraf ، ayk jn andayks ayk zayada aam andayks dahanchha hay jo pychydha aadad wa shmar ki aksam kay liye astamal hawta hay ، bshmwl ary aur jama aksam۔yha mtn sy bahar mkhtlf ksm kay dayta kay liye mwsar astfsar karnay ki salahaytwn ko fraham krta haay۔dwnwn kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar mkhsawsa dayta dahanchay ، astfsar ki zurwryat ، aur aap ki drkhwast ki asharyha sazay ki zurwryat par haay۔

Question: ghair mlky klyd aur chyk rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: aarzuy jdwl aur mstkl tybl kay darmiyan bnyady frk un ki zandghy aur astkamt main haay۔yhaan klydy amtyazaat hayn: aarzuy jdwl: zandghy: ayk mkhsawsa syshn ya knkshn kay liye ayk aarzuy jdwl tyar kya gaya hay aur sirf is syshn ki mdt kay liye mwjwd haay۔jb syshn khtm hawjata hay ya jab saarf kay zaryaha wazuha tawr par ghraya jata hay tou isy khud bkhwd ghra diya jata hay (hazaf)ayk bar syshn khtm hony kay bad ، aarzuy tybl main mhafwza krdha dayta khw jata haay۔ astamal: aarzuy jdwlyn aam tawr par pychydha swalat ya tarykha kar kay doran antrmydayt ya aarzuy dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔wha dusray smwrty syshnwn main mdakhlt kyay baghair kesi mkhsawsa syshn kay andr dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur jwra twra karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hayn۔ askwp: aarzuy jdwlwn main ayk mhadwd dairha kar hay aur sirf syshn ya knkshn kay andr hi kabl rsaiy hain js nay inhain tkhlyk kya haay۔wha dusray syshnwn ya rabtawn kay liye mriy ya kabl rsaiy nahin hayn۔ pyr mynynt tybl: zandghy: ayk mstkl tybl ، jsay bakaadha ya mstkl jdwl kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، kesi khasa syshn sy aazaadanha tawr par mwjwd haay۔yha dayta bys main rhata hay jab tak keh saarf kay zaryaha ya kesi mkhsawsa dayta bys aydamnstryshn kmanda kay zaryaha wazuha tawr par ghraya jata haay۔ dayta astkamt: mstkl jdwlyn syshnwn main dayta brkrar rkhty hayn۔mstkl jdwl main zakhyrha shuda aadad wa shmar brkrar nahin rhatay hain jab tak keh is main trmym ، hazaf ya wazuha tawr par ghraya jata haay۔ ywzaj: mstkl myzayn dayta bys main tawyl mdty dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur un kay antzaam kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔wha aam tawr par aadad wa shmar kay anakad kay liye bnaiay jatay hain js tak rsaiy aur brkrar rkhnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ askwp: mstkl jdwlwn main wsya tr dairha kar hawta hay aur saarfyn ko di janay wali ajazatwn aur rsaiy kay mraaat kay lhaaza sy ، mtadd syshn ya rabtawn kay zaryaha is tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔ smry۔، aarzuy jdwlwn ko ayk mkhsawsa syshn kay andr tkhlyk aur astamal kya jata hay ، is ki zandghy mkhtsar hawty hay ، aur aarzuy ya antrmydayt dayta rkhtay hayn۔wha syshn kay akhttam par khud bkhwd chhwra dyiay jatay hain ya jab wazuha tawr par ghra diya jata haay۔dwsry taraf ، mstkl jdwlyn ، kesi khasa syshn kay aazaadanha tawr par mwjwd hain ، syshnwn main dayta brkrar rkhtay hain ، aur tawyl mdty dayta astwryj aur antzaam kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔jb tak wazuha tawr par ghraya jata hay woh dayta bys main rhatay hayn۔

Question: NULL aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: aalmy aarzuy tybl aur mkamy aarzuy tybl kay darmiyan frk un kay dairha kar aur rsai main haay۔yhaan hr ayk ki wzuahat haay: aalmy aarzuy jdwl: dairha kar: ayk aalmy aarzuy jdwl dayta bys msaal kay andr tamam syshnwn ya rabtawn kay liye nzar aata haay۔as tak rsaiy aur ayk sy zayada syshnwn kay zaryaha ayk sath rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔yha mkhtlf syshnwn main astamal kay l available dstyab hay jab tak keh isy hata nah diya jaiay۔ dayta shyirngh dayta: aalmy aarzuy jdwlyn aysay mnzarnamwn kay liye mwzawn hain jahan mtadd syshnwn ko aarzuy dayta shyir karnay ki zurwrt haay۔har syshn tybl main rykarda dakhl ، ap dayt aur hazaf krskta hay ، aur tbdylyan dusray syshnwn main nzar aaty hayn۔ tybl nam tnazaaat: aalmy aarzuy jdwlwn main aalmy nam ka dairha haay۔aghr ayk sy zayada syshn ayk hi nam kay sath aarzuy jdwlyn tkhlyk karty hain tou ، woh ayk hi tybl ka hawalha dyn ghay۔taham ، hr syshn main tybl kay andr dayta ka apna ayk syt hawta haay۔ klyn ap: aalmy aarzuy tybl ko ghranay ki zamha dary saarf ya drkhwast kay sath haay۔jb syshn khtm hawta hay tou isy khud bkhwd nahin ghraya jata haay۔ lwkl aarzuy tybl: dairha kar: mkamy aarzuy tybl sirf syshn ya knkshn kay andr hi nzar aata hay jo isy tkhlyk krta haay۔yha dusray syshnwn ya rabtawn kay liye kabl rsaiy ya mriy nahin haay۔ayk bar syshn khtm hony ya band hony kay bad ، mkamy aarzuy tybl ko khud bkhwd ghra diya jata hay aur is ka dayta hazaf hawjata haay۔ trtyb: hr syshn ya knkshn main mkamy aarzuy tybl ki apni alag alag msaal hawty haay۔ayk syshn kay zaryaha tybl main ki janay wali tbdylyan dusray syshnwn tak mriy ya kabl rsaiy nahin hayn۔ tybl nam tnazaaat: mkamy aarzuy jdwlwn main mkamy nam ka dairha kar haay۔har syshn ayk hi nam kay sath ayk tybl tshkyl dy sakta hay ، aur woh alyhadha ، aazaad jdwlwn ka hawalha dyn ghay۔ aatwmytk safaiy: mkamy aarzuy jdwlwn ko khud bkhwd ghra diya jata hay aur saaf hawjata hay jab syshn nay un ko khtm kya۔as sy woh saaf sthra safaiy amlwn ki zurwrt kay baghair aarzuy dayta astwryj kay l capading aasan bnatay hayn۔ khlasaha yeh keh ayk aalmy aarzuy jdwl tamam syshnwn kay liye dkhaiy dyta hay aur jab tak wazuha tawr par ghraya jata hay is wkt tak brkrar rhata hay ، js sy mtadd syshn aarzuy dayta ko shyir krsktay hayn۔dwsry taraf ، ayk mkamy aarzuy jdwl syshn kay liye mkhsawsa hay jo isy tkhlyk krta hay ، syshn kay akhttam par khud bkhwd ghra diya jata hay ، aur dusray syshnwn sy alag thlgh hawjata haay۔aalmy aur mkamy aarzuy jdwlwn kay mabyn antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، jesay syshnwn main dayta shyirngh ki zurwrt ya khwdkar safaiy ki khwahash۔

Question: ayk anwkha aur bnyady klydy rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: trashay hoey tybl aur darap tybl kay byanat dono ays kyw ayl main dayta bys sy dayta ya pori myzayn hatanay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain ، lekin un kay mkhtlf asarat aur mkasad hayn۔yhaan hr ayk ki wzuahat haay: trnkyt tybl: aapryshn: tybl ki sakht ko brkrar rkhtay hoey tybl sy tamam ktaarwn (dayta) ko hatanay kay liye trnkyt tybl ka byan astamal kya jata haay۔ dayta ko hatana: tybl tybl tybl main mwjwd tamam ktaar ko hazaf krta hay ، js kay ntyjay main ayk hawta haay۔khaly tybl۔ karkrdghy: trank tybl aam tawr par hazaf shuda byan ka astamal karty hoey anfrady ktaarwn ko hazaf karnay sy tyza tr hawta hay kywnkha yeh ayk sy ktaaat ko hatanay kay bjaiay tybl kay zaryaha astamal hony waly dayta kay safhaat ko zuaia krta haay۔ aatw-ankrmnt: jab aap trnkyt tybl ka astamal karty hain tou ، koi bhi aatw-jdwl main ankrymnt ya shnakht kay kalm un ki abtdaiy akdar par dwbarha trtyb dyiay jatay hayn۔ transkshnl salmyt: trnkyt tybl ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) aapryshn hay aur isy waps nahin kya jaskta haay۔yha tybl sy wabstha kesi bhi mhark ko bhi brtarf nahin krta haay۔taham ، aapryshn ayk braay lyn dyn ka hasaha hawskta hay js main dusray day aym ayl (dayta hayra phyry ki zaban) kay byanat shaml hayn۔ darap tybl: aapryshn: darap tybl byan ayk dayta bys sy is kay dahanchay aur dayta smyt pori tybl ko mkml tawr par hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tybl ko hatana: darap tybl tybl ko khud hi hazaf krdyta hay ، is kay sath sath tamam aadad wa shmar ، asharyha jat ، rkawtwn aur tybl sy wabstha mharkat kay sath۔yha tybl aur is sy wabstha tamam ashyaa ko dayta bys sy mstkl tawr par hatata haay۔tybl ، darap tybl ayk day day ayl aapryshn hay aur isy waps nahin kya jaskta۔yha aam tawr par tranzaykshn kay andr astamal nahin hawta haay۔ khlasaha main ، tybl tybl tybl kay dahanchay ko brkrar rkhtay hoey tamam ktaarwn ko ayk myza sy hatata hay ، jabky darap tybl is ki sakht aur is sy wabstha ashyaa kay sath sath pori tybl ko bhi hatata haay۔dayta bys sy tybl ko mstkl tawr par khtm karnay kay liye darap tybl ka astamal dayta ko hatanay kay liye tyza aur zayada mwsar haay۔dwnwn kay mabyn antkhab aap ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، chahaay aap tybl dahanchay ko brkrar rkhna chahti ho ya isy mkml tawr par hatana chahti haw۔

Question: lwda dayta anfail aur lwda dayta lwkl anfail byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys kay tnazar main ، ayk chyk rkawt aur ghair mlky klydy rkawt mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt krty haay: chyk rkawt: ayk kalm main zakhyrha shuda akdar par dawmyn sy mtalk mkhsawsa kwaad ya shraita ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk chyk rkawt ka astamal kya jata haay۔yha aap ko aysy haalt ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo ayk myza ki hr saf kay liye sch hona chahaiay۔aghr koi ktaar haalt ki khlaf wrzay krty hay tou ، rkawt ktaar kay andraj ya trmym ko rwkty haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap yeh nafza karnay kay liye chyk rkawt ka astamal krsktay hain keh ayk addy kalm sirf msabt akdar ko kbwl krta hay ya yeh keh strngh kalm sirf kuch nmwnwn ko kbwl krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda kryt tybl mlazamyn (mlazam INT praimry klyd ، amr ki janch (amr> = 18).salmyt ka kaadha۔yha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ayk tybl main kalm (ya kalmwn kay ghrwp) main akdar kesi aur tybl main bnyady klyd ya mnfrd klydy kalm main akdar kay msawy hayn۔yha rkawt mtalkha jdwlwn main dayta mstkl mzaajy aur salmyt ko brkrar rkhty haay۔aam tawr par ، hawalha denay wala kalm hawalha denay waly tybl ki bnyady klyd haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda kryt tybl aardar (aardarda INT praimry klyd ، kstmr aai day ، ... ghair mlky klyd (kstmr aai day) kay saarfyn (kstmr aai day)) ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ،ghyr mlky klydy rkawt aardar tybl aur saarfyn kay tybl kay mabyn ayk rshtha kaim krty hay ، jahan aardar tybl main kstmr aai day kalm saarfyn kay tybl main bnyady klydy kalm kstmr ka hawalha dyta haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh aardar tybl main sirf drst kstmr aai day dakhl ki jaskty hayn۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، ayk hi tybl kay andr dayta ki twsayk ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk chyk rkawt ka astamal kya jata hay ، jabky mtalkha jdwlwn kay mabyn ryfrntl salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye ghair mlky klydy rkawt ka astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: byan main tbdyl karnay aur dakhl karnay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys kay tnazar main ، kalmwn main NULL akdar ko snbhalnay kay liye kwaad ki wzuahat kay liye kaladm rkawt aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ka astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: kaladm rkawt ka astamal nahin kya jata hay keh ayk kalm main hamyshha hona zurwry haay۔ayk ghair nwl kdr۔yha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ayk tybl ki hr saf main kalm ki kdr hawty hay aur kalm main kaladm akdar kay dakhl karnay sy rwkta haay۔as rkawt ko laghw karnay sy ، aap kesi kdr ki mwjwdghy ki zurwrt kay zaryaha dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karty hayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda kryt tybl mlazamyn (mlazam INT INT praimry klyd ، nam wrchr (50) NULL nahin ، ...) ؛ mzakwrha msaal main nahin ، kaladm nahin haaynam kay kalm par rkawt ka atalak hawta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh is main mlazamyn main hr saf kay liye hamyshha ghair nwl kymt hawty haay۔ tybl۔ dayfalt rkawt: kalm kay liye dayfalt wylyw ki wzuahat karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ka astamal kya jata hay jab ayk kay doran koi wazuha kymt fraham nahin ki jati haay۔dakhl karain aapryshn۔aghr kesi kalm main pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ki wzuahat ki jati hay ، aur jab niy ktaar dakhl ki jati hay tou is kalm kay liye koi kdr ki wzuahat nahin ki jati hay tou ، pehlay sy taay shuda kymt khud bkhwd astamal hawjaty haay۔phalay sy taay shuda rkawt akhtyary hay ، aur is sy un maamlat main mdd mlty hay jahan aap pehlay sy taay shuda kymt fraham karna chahti hain jab koi bhi wazuha tawr par fraham nahin kya jata haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda kryt tybl saarfyn (kstmr ID INT praimry klyd ، pehla nam wrchr (50) NULL nahin ، aakhry nam wrchar (50)NULL nahin ، ay myl wrchr (100) pehlay sy taay shuda 'N/A' ، ...) ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ko ay myl kalm par laghw kya jata hay ، js main 'N/A' ko pehlay sy taay shuda kymt kay tawr par byan kya jata haay۔aghr dakhl karnay ka aml wazuha tawr par ay myl kalm kay liye koi kdr fraham nahin krta hay tou ، pehlay sy taay shuda kymt 'N/A' astamal ki jaye ghy۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، ayk kaladm ko ykyny nahin bnata hay keh kalm main hamyshha ghair nwl kymt honi chahaiay ، jabky pehlay sy taay shdharkawt ayk pehlay sy taay shuda kymt ki wzuahat krty hay jo astamal ki jati hay jab dakhl karnay kay aapryshn kay doran koi wazuha kymt fraham nahin ki jati haay۔

Question: kesi tazaha kary aur hazaf shuda byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dono tybl tybl aur byanat sy hazaf karnay waly dayta bys main kesi tybl sy dayta ko hatanay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh apni faalyt aur tarza aml main mkhtlf hayn: trnkyt tybl: trnkyt tybl ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) byan hay jo tamam ktaar ko jldy sy hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk tybl۔ tybl tybl aapryshn hr saf ko hazaf karnay kay liye anfrady tawr par lagh un nahin hawta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، yeh dayta kay safhaat ko khtm krta hay aur astwryj ki jghha ko jary krta hay ، js sy isy hazaf karnay sy tyza aur zayada mwsar hawta haay۔ trankyt tybl ghair tranzaykshnl aapryshn hay aur isy waps nahin kya jaskta haay۔ayk bar phansy kay bad ، aadad wa shmar ko mstkl tawr par hazaf krdya jata haay۔ tybl tybl sy wabstha kesi bhi aatw ankrymntngh shnakhty kalmwn ya trtyb ko bhi dwbarha trtyb dyta haay۔ trnkyt tybl trghrza ko fair nahin krta haay۔ trnkyt tybl anfrady ktaar ko hazaf karnay kay l any kesi bhi lagh un andrajat ko tyar nahin krta hay ، js sy yeh kam wsail bnta haay۔-intistence.example: SQLCOPY CODETRUNCATE tybl saarfyn ؛ sy hazaf kryn: hazaf kryn: kesi DML (dayta main hayra phyry zaban) byan hay jo kesi haalt ki bnyad par ya kesi haalt kay baghair kesi tybl sy mkhsawsa ktaarwn ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay (jw tamam ktaaryn hazaf krta haay)۔har saf ko hazaf karnay kay liye lagh un hawta hay ، js sy yeh trankyt tybl sy aahastha aur zayada wsail sy zayada hawta haay۔ daylyt sy daylyt ayk tranzaykshnl aapryshn hay aur agar tranzaykshn kay andr amldraamd kya jata hay tou isy waps laya jaskta haay۔tybl sy wabstha fair trghrs say۔ayk tybl sy ktaaryn ، astwryj ki jghha jary krty hay ، aur ghair tranzaykshnl hay ، jabky hazaf sy zayada antkhaby ktaar ko hatanay ki ajazat dyta hay ، anfrady ktaar ko hazaf karnay ko lagh krta hay ، aur yeh lyn dyn hawta haay۔an kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar sawrthaal ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur rkawtwn par haay۔

Question: ayk chhwta sa tybl aur darap tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk tkhlyk tybl astytmnt aur ayk darap tybl byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo dayta bys tyblza ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: tybl bnaiyn: tybl bnaiyn byan ko dayta bys main ayk nya tybl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh tybl kay nam ، kalm ki wzuahat krta haay۔nam ، aadad wa shmar ki aksam ، rkawtyn ، aur kesi bhi dusray tybl sy mtalk khasa safat۔ tkhlyk tybl ka byan tybl ki sakht aur askyma ki wzuahat krta hay ، js main is kay kalm ، dayta ki aksam aur rkawtyn shaml hayn۔byan krdha dahanchha۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda kryt tybl saarfyn (kstmr aai day aai ty praimry klyd ، pehla nam wrchar (50) ، last nam wrchr (50) ، ay myl wrchr (100) ، ...) ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، tkhlyk tybl ka byan ayk tkhlyk krta haay۔tybl ka nam "ghahak" js main kstmr aai day ، frst nam ، aakhry nam ، ay myl ، aur isi tarah kay kalm hayn۔ darap tybl: darap tybl ka byan dayta bys sy mwjwdha tybl ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tmam ktaaryn aur kalm۔ darap tybl byan ayk dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj (day day ayl) byan haay۔darap tybl ka byan dayta bys sy "saarfyn" tybl ko hata dyta hay ، bshmwl is kay tamam dayta aur is sy wabstha dahanchay۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، tybl byan ko ayk mkhsawsa dahanchay kay sath ayk nya tybl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky darap tybl byan ko ayk hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mwjwdha tybl aur dayta bys sy is ka sara dayta۔

Question: tkhlyk tybl aur altr tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys ka byan aur ayk darap dayta bys byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo dayta bys ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: dayta bys bnaiyn: dayta bys mynjmnt sstm (day by aym ays) main ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye dayta bys ka byan astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh nam ki wzuahat krta haay۔niay dayta bys aur kesi bhi dusray dayta bys sy mtalk mkhsawsa safat main say۔ dayta bys byan tkhlyk ayk niay dayta bys kay wjwd aur abtdaiy trtybat ki wzuahat krta haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، dayta bys ka byan mkhsawsa nam aur abtdaiy trtybat kay sath ayk khaly dayta bys tshkyl dyta haay۔dayta bys myDatabase ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، dayta bys ka byan "myDatabase." kay nam sy ayk nya dayta bys tshkyl dyta haay۔ darap dayta bys: darap dayta bys ka byan DBMS.IT sy mwjwdha dayta bys ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js main poray dayta bys ko mstkl tawr par hazaf krdya jata haay۔، dayta ، aur is sy wabstha aabjykt (jysay ، aaraa ، asharyha jat ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar). darap dayta bys ka byan ayk dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj (day day ayl) byan haay۔.example: SQLCOPY kwdadarwp dayta bys MyDatabase ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، darap dayta bys ka byan day by aym sy "maiy dayta bys" dayta bys ko hata dyta hay ، bshmwl is kay tamam jdwlwn ، dayta ، aur is sy wabstha aabjykt۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، dayta bys ka byan A ko tkhlyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔nya dayta bys ، jabky darap dayta bys ka byan day by aym sy mwjwdha dayta bys aur is kay tamam mndrjat ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: tkhlyk dayta bys aur darap dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: byk ap dayta bys ka byan aur bhaaly dayta bys ka byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo baltrtyb dayta bys byk ap aur bhaaly kay antzaam kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wha mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: byk ap dayta bys: byk ap dayta bys ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh aap ko byk ap kay wkt dayta bys ki ryast ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey ، dayta bys kay dayta aur tranzaykshn lagh failwn ki ayk kapy bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔byk ap dayta bys ka byan ayk byk ap fail tshkyl dyta hay jsay dayta bys ko bhaal karnay main bad main astamal kay l a ayk alyhadha jghha ، jesay dask ya typ main mhafwza kya jaskta haay۔ is main byk ap ki ksm (mkml ، tfryk ، ya tranzaykshn lagh byk ap) ki wzuahat karnay kay akhtyarat shaml hayn۔، byk ap mnzal ، aur dyghr byk ap sy mtalk mkhsawsa trtybat۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda byk ap dayta bys MyDatabase to Disk = 'C: \ byk ap \ myDatabase.bak' ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، byk ap dayta bys ka byan "myDatabase.bak" kay nam sy byk ap fail tshkyl dyta haay۔"MyDatabase" dayta bys kay liye aur isy mkhsawsa dask kay mkam par astwrza krta haay۔ rysstwr dayta bys: bhaaly dayta bys ka byan is sy pehlay kay byk ap dayta bys ko is kay asal ya mkhtlf mkam par bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh aap ko byk ap fail sy dayta bys ki bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ،byk ap kay doran pkraay gaye ryast main isy waps lana۔ bhaaly dayta bys ka byan byk ap fail ko prahta hay aur dayta bys ko dwbarha bnanay kay liye byk ap dayta aur tranzaykshn lagh rykarda ko laghw krta haay۔ is main aam tawr par makhza byk ap fail ، mnzal kay dayta bys ka nam ki wzuahat karnay kay akhtyarat shaml hayn۔awr mkam ، aur dyghr bhaaly sy mtalk mkhsawsa trtybat۔ msaal kay tawr par SQLCOPY kwdarstwr dayta bys MyDatabase sy dask = 'C: \ byk ap \ myDatabase.bak' ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، bhaaly dayta bys kay byan main "MyDatabase" dayta bys ko mkhsawsa byk ap fail sy bhaal kya gaya haay۔، dayta bys ko is kay asal nam aur mkam kay sath dwbarha bnana۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، byk ap dayta bys ka byan dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky bhaaly dayta bys kay byan ko pehlay kay byk ap dayta bys ko is kay asal ya mkhtlf mkam par bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: byk ap dayta bys aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys sykywrty aur ajazat kay tnazar main ، ayk ghrant ka byan aur ayk mnswkh byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo saarf kay mraaat ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: ghrant byan: ghrant ka byan saarf ya saarf ghrwp ko mkhsawsa mraaat denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ksy dayta bys myn۔ yeh dayta bys aydamnstrytr ya saarf ko kafy asthakak kay sath dusray saarfyn ya krdarwn ko kuch ajazatyn tfwyzu karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ghrant ka byan mkhtlf stahawn par mntkhb ، dakhl ، ap dayt ، hazaf ، ya dyghr dayta bys sy mtalk ajazat jesay mraaat ki frahamy krskta haay۔۔saarf 1 ko mzakwrha bala msaal main ، ghrant ka byan "mlazamyn" tybl par "saarf 1" par mntkhb aur mraaat dyta haay۔ksy dayta bys myn۔ yeh dayta bys aydamnstrytr ya saarf ko kafy mraaat kay haaml mkhsawsa ajazatwn ko kaladm karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo pehlay dyiay gaye thay۔ aywwky byan mkhtlf stahawn par anfrady mraaat ya mraaat kay ghrwp ko mnswkh krskta hay (jysay ، dayta bys ki staha ، tybl ki staha ، kalm ki staha) .kwaik byan par aml draamd kya jata hay ، mkhsawsa saarf ya saarf ghrwp mnswkh shuda mraaat sy mharwm hawjata hay aur ab mkhsawsa ashyaa par mnswkh hony wali karrwaiywn ko anjam nahin dy sakta haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY CODEREVOKE saarf 1 sy mlazamyn par mntkhb karain ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، rykwwk byan"ywzar 1" sy "mlazamyn" tybl par mntkhb asthakak ko mnswkh krta haay۔ khlasaha byan karnay kay liye ، ghrant kay byan ko saarf ya saarf ghrwp ko mraaat denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js sy woh mkhsawsa ashyaa par mkhsawsa akdamat karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، jabky rykwkyt byan ka astamal kya jata haay۔as sy pehlay dyiay gaye mraaat ko door karain ، js sy saarf tak rsaiy aur ashyaa par karrwaiywn ko mhadwd kya jaiay۔

Question: ghrant aur mnswkh karnay waly byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: flsh mraaat ka byan aur flsh tyblza ka byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo ays kyw ayl dayta bys ki antzaamyha main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: flsh mraaat: flsh mraaat ka byan asthakak ki myzawn ko dwbarha lwda karnay aur mymwry kych main tazaha kary kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔saarf kay asthakak۔ yeh aam tawr par ghrant ya kaladm byanat ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay mraaat main trmym karnay kay bad astamal hawta haay۔ jab flsh fraayljza kay byan ko amly jamha phanaya jata hay tou ، ays kyw ayl srwr tazaha trien asthakak ki myzayn prahta hay aur tbdylywn ka atalak krta hay ، js sy niy mraaat ko fwry tawr par mwsar bnaya jata haay۔ yeh byan zurwry haay۔as bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh saarf kay mraaat main ki janay wali koi tbdyly srwr ko dwbarha shrwa karnay ki zurwrt kay baghair nafza alaml hawty haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwdaflsh mraaat ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، flsh mraaat ka byan saarf ki mraaat main kesi bhi haalyha tbdylywn ko laghw karnay kay liye asthakak ki myzawn ko dwbarha lwda krta haay۔ flsh myzayn: flsh tyblza: flsh myzayntyblza ka byan kesi dayta bys main tamam jdwlwn ko band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، kesi bhi kyshda dayta ko mؤsar tarykay sy mstrd karty hayn۔ yeh ykyny bnata hay keh myzawn par zayr altwaa tamam tbdylyan dask par lkhy jati hain aur mwjwdha syshn kay pas mwjwd kesi bhi tybl talay ko jary krty hayn۔ flsh tyblza ka byan aam tawr par hawta haay۔jb dayta bys byk ap ko anjam dytay wkt astamal kya jata hay ، kywnkha yeh byk ap kay aml ko shrwa karnay sy pehlay tamam zayr altwaa tbdylyan lkh kar dayta mstkl mzaajy ko ykyny bnanay main mdd krta haay۔ yeh byan saarf kay asthakak ya rsaiy ki ajazatwn ko mtasar nahin krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwdaflwsh tyblza ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، flsh tyblza ka byantmam jdwlwn ko band aur dwbarha khwlta hay ، kesi bhi kyshda dayta ko kharj karna aur tybl kay talay jary krta haay۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، flsh mraaat kay byan ko asthakak ki myzawn ko dwbarha lwda karnay aur saarf ki mraaat main tbdylywn ka atalak karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky flsh tyblza kay byan ko myzayn band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata haay۔dayta mstkl mzaajy aur tybl kay talay jary krna۔

Question: flsh mraaat aur flsh tyblza kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk shw tyblza ka byan aur tybl byan byan krdha ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo dayta bys tyblza kay baray main malwmat haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: tyblza dkhaiyn: shw tyblza ka byan dayta bys kay andr tyblza ki fharst bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh is kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔mwjwdha dayta bys ya kesi mkhsawsa dayta bys main mwjwd myzayn۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، shw tyblza ka byan tyblza kay namwn ki fharst main ayk ntyjha syt krta haay۔ yeh byan tyblza kay dahanchay ya kalmwn kay baray main tfsayly malwmat fraham nahin krta haay۔؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، shw tyblza ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys main jdwlwn ki fharst lwtata haay۔ tybl ki wzuahat kryn: tybl ki sakht kay baray main tfsayly malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye tybl byan (ya is ka mtradf ، shw kalm byan) ki wzuahat kryn۔yha kalmwn ، aadad wa shmar ki aksam ، rkawtwn aur kesi khasa jdwl ki dyghr khsawsayat kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، tybl ka byan byan kalm kay namwn ، aadad wa shmar ki aksam ، naly ahalyt ، klydy rkawtwn aur mkhsawsa ki dyghr khsawsayat ko zaahar krta haay۔jdwl۔ yeh byan khasa tawr par tybl kay askyma aur sakht ko smjhnay kay liye mfyd haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda aydaskraib saarfyn ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، tybl ka byan byan "saarfyn" tybl kay dahanchay kay baray main tfsayly malwmat fraham krta hay ، bshmwl kalm kay nam ، dayta bhi shaml haay۔aksam ، aur kesi bhi ksm ki rkawtyn۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، shw tyblza ka byan dayta bys main jdwlwn ki fharst ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky byan krdha tybl byan ko kesi mkhsawsa jdwl kay dahanchay aur kalmwn kay baray main tfsayly malwmat haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: ayk shw tyblza aur tybl byan ki wzuahat kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys ki antzaamyha main ayk shw dayta bys ka byan aur astamal dayta bys byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: dayta bys dkhaiyn: dayta bys kay srwr par dstyab dayta bys ki fharst ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh malwmat fraham krta haay۔mwjwdha dayta bys srwr msaal kay tawr par mwjwd dayta bys۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، shw dayta bys ka byan dayta bys kay namwn ki fharst main lwtata haay۔ yeh byan fy alhaal faal dayta bys ko tbdyl ya tbdyl nahin krta haay۔، shw dayta bys ka byan dayta bys srwr par dstyab dayta bys ki fharst lwtata haay۔ astamal karain dayta bys: astamal shuda dayta bys ka byan kesi mkhsawsa dayta bys ko mntkhb karnay ya tbdyl karnay kay liye mwjwdha kam karnay waly dayta bys ki haysayt sy astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh aap ko yeh btanay ki ajazat dyta hay keh aap kis dayta bys ko kam karna chahti hayn۔as kay sath ، aur is kay bad kay ays kyw ayl kay byanat ko is dayta bys kay syak wa sbak kay andr hi aml main laya jaye gha۔ astamal kay dayta bys kay byan ko amly jamha phanaya jata hay ، is kay bad kay tamam ays kyw ayl byanat mntkhb krdha dayta bys kay andr kam karty hain jab tak keh ayk mkhtlf dayta bys ka antkhab nah kya jaiay۔ yeh byan syshn kay liye fy alhaal faal dayta bys ko tbdyl krta hay ، js ki ajazat dytay hayn۔aap is dayta bys kay andr mwjwd ashyaa tak rsaiy aur un main hayra phyry karain ghay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY Coduse MyDatabase ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، astamal dayta bys ka byan "MyDatabase" ko mwjwdha dayta bys kay tawr par taay krta hay ، aur is kay bad kay tamam SQL byanat ko is dayta bys kay tnazar main aml main laya jaye gha۔khlasaha karnay kay liye ، shw dayta bys ka byan dstyab dayta bys ki fharst ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky astamal kay dayta bys ka byan bad main ays kyw ayl kay byanat kay liye mwjwdha wrkngh dayta bys kay tawr par kesi mkhsawsa dayta bys ko mntkhb karnay aur tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: shw kay dayta bys aur astamal kay dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk shw ghrant ka byan aur ayk shw mtghyr byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo dayta bys sy mkhsawsa malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: ghrant dkhaiyn: ghrant ka byan saarf ya saarf ghrwp ko di janay wali mraaat aur ajazatwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dayta bys myn۔ yeh kesi saarf ya krdar ko tfwyzu krdha mkhsawsa mraaat aur rsaiy kay hakwk kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔ jab aml draamd hawta hay tou ، shw ghrant ka byan ayk mkhsawsa saarf ya krdar ko dyiay gaye mraaat ki fharst main lst krta haay۔ yeh byan tfhaym kay liye khasa tawr par mfyd haay۔dayta bys main saarf ya krdar ko phanchanay wali rsaiy aur ajazat ki staha۔ msaal kay tawr pr: saarf 1 kay liye SQLCOPY kwda shw ghrant ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، shw ghrant ka byan dayta bys main "saarf 1" ko dyiay gaye mraaat ko bazayaft krta haay۔mtghyrat ka byan dayta bys srwr main knfyghryshn mtghyr ki mwjwdha akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh dayta bys srwr main mkhtlf trtybat aur trtyb kay akhtyarat kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، mtghyr ka byan mtghyr namwn aur un kay mtalkha ki fharst main lwtata haay۔akdar۔ yeh byan khasa tawr par dayta bys srwr ki mwjwdha trtyb ki trtybat ka maainha aur smjhnay kay liye mfyd haay۔ msaal kay tawr par 'myks_kwnshnza' jesay SQLCOPY kwda shw mtghyr ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، shw mtghyr byan "myks_kwnshnza" trtyb mtghyr ki kdr ko bazayaft krta haay۔dayta bys srwr۔ khlasaha karnay kay l the ، shw ghrants ka byan dayta bys main saarf ya krdar ko dyiay gaye mraaat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky dayta bys srwr main knfyghryshn mtghyr ki mwjwdha akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye shw mtghyr byan ka astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: shw ghrant aur shw mtghyr kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk wzuahat byan aur tjzayha tybl byan dono ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo karkrdghy kay tjzayha aur asalaha kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: byan byan: wzuahat byan ko mntkhb krdha byan kay amldraamd kay mnsawbay kay baray main malwmat haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh is baray main bsayrt fraham krta hay keh kis tarhadayta bys anjn ayk mkhsawsa astfsar par amldraamd kray gha۔ jab aml main laya gaya tou ، wzuahat byan swal kay mnsawbay kay baray main malwmat lwtata hay ، bshmwl tybl tak rsaiy ، alghwrthm main shaml hony ، andayks astamal ، aur tkhmynha shuda ktaar ghnty smyt۔ yeh byan tjzayha aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krta haay۔mmknha rkawtwn ya ghair mwsar astfsar par aml draamd kay rastwn ki nshandhay krkay ayk mntkhb byanmkhsawsa haalt kay sath "saarfyn" tybl۔ tjzayha tybl: tjzayha tybl ka byan kesi tybl kay aadadwshmar ko ap dayt karnay aur inhain dayta bys kay myta dayta main astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ is sy dayta bys aaptymaizar ko astfsar par aml draamd kay mnsawbwn kay baray main bakhbr fysalay karnay main mdd mlty hay js kay baray main drst malwmat fraham karty hayn۔tybl kay aadad wa shmar ki tksym۔ jab aml draamd kya gaya tou ، tjzayha tybl ka byan tybl ko askyn krta hay ، aadad wa shmar ki tksym kay baray main shmaryaty malwmat aktha krta hay ، aur myta dayta ko ap dayt krta haay۔ yeh byan khasa tawr par mfyd hay jab tybl kay aadad wa shmar ki tksym main nmayan tawr par tbdyly aai hay ، ya bray tadad main dakhl hony kay bad.khlasaha karnay kay liye ، wzuahat byan ko kesi mntkhb byan kay amldraamd kay mnsawbay kay baray main malwmat haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js sy astfsar ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha aur asalaha main mdd mlty haay۔dwsry taraf ، tjzayha tybl kay byan ko kesi tybl kay aadadwshmar ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، dayta bys aaptymaizar ko aadad wa shmar ki tksym ki drst malwmat par mbny mwsar astfsar par aml draamd karnay kay mnsawbwn main mdd fraham krta haay۔

Question: ayk wzuahat aur tjzayha tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: bwjh dayta anfl astytmnt aur lwda dayta lwkl anfail byan ays kyw ayl main kesi byrwny fail sy dayta ko kesi tybl main lwda karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain ، lekin woh fail kay mkam aur ajazat ki zurwryat kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn: lwda dayta anfail: lwda daytaanfail byan ka astamal dayta bys srwr par waka kesi byrwny fail sy dayta lwda karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ byan main byan krdha fail ka rastha dayta bys srwr kay fail sstm sy kabl rsaiy hona chahaiay۔. fail ko braha rast ays kyw ayl srwr kay zaryaha praha jata hay aur is par karrwaiy ki jati haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda lwda dayta infile '/path/to/file.csv' ko tybl maiy tybl main ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، lwda dayta anfyl astytmnt fail sy dayta ko lwda krta hay '//dayta bys srwr par 'mytable' tybl par rastha/to/file.csv 'byan main byan krdha fail ka rastha klaint mshyn kay fail sstm sy kabl rsaiy hona chahaiay۔ is byan kay liye fail asthakak ko astfsar par aml draamd karnay waly ays kyw ayl saarf ko diya jaye ، nyza klaint ki taraf sy mkamy salahayt bhi kabl aml haay۔ fail ko praha jata haay۔klaint aur prwsysngh kay liye ays kyw ayl srwr ko bhyja ghya۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda lwda dayta mkamy infile '/path/to/file.csv' ko tybl maiy tybl main ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، lwda dayta lwkl anfyl astytmnt fail sy dayta ko lwda krta hay '/dayta bys srwr par 'mytable' tybl main klaint mshyn par rastha/to/file.csv 'mkamy anfail byan ka astamal maiy ays kyw ayl klaint ko chlanay wali klaint mshyn par waka byrwny fail sy dayta lwda karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔mؤkhr alzakr ko mkamy salahayt ko klaint ki taraf sy faal karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay aur klaint ko srwr ko fail ka dayta prahnay aur bhyjnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: ayk chhwta sa tybl aur darap tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: pehlay fraham krdha ghalat rdaml kay liye mazart۔ays kyw ayl main ، bwjh dayta anfail aur lwda dayta lwkl anfail byanat main koi frk nahin haay۔dwnwn byanat ko byrwny fail sy dayta bys main tybl main dayta lwda karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ dayta ko lwda anfl aur lwda dayta lwkl anfail ayk dusray kay kabl tbadlha byanat hain aur ays kyw ayl srwr ki mkhsawsa syt ap aur tshkyl kay lhaaza sy is ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔ks byan ka antkhab astamal karnay kay liye saarf aur srwr knfyghryshn ki trtybat ko di janay wali mraaat par mnhasar haay۔ lwda dayta anfail astamal kya jata hay jab ays kyw ayl srwr main mhafwza_fail_pryw sstm mtghyr syt hawta hay ، jo srwr par ayk daairktry ki wzuahat krta hay jahan failwn sy bhry jaskty haay۔as maamlay main ، byan main byan ki hogi fail srwr kay fail sstm sy kabl rsaiy honi chahaiay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda lwda dayta infile '/path/to/file.csv' main tybl maiy tybl main Load lwda dayta lwkl anfail astamal kya jata hay jab mhafwza_fail_pryw sstm mtghyrsyt nahin hay ، ya jab saarf ko mkamy aapshn ko astamal karnay kay liye mtalwbha mraaat haasal hawn۔yha MYSQL klaint chlanay waly klaint mshyn sy fail lwda karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ msaalsrwr knfyghryshn aur saarf kay mraaat myn۔taham ، kesi byrwny fail sy dayta lwda karnay kay l their un ki faalyt kay lhaaza sy ، dono byanat bnyady tawr par ayk jesay hayn۔

Question: ayk mntkhb * aur mntkhb kalm_ nam kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: byan main tbdyl karain aur byan main dakhl karain dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo kesi jdwl main dayta dakhl karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh apnay tarza aml aur astamal kay maamlat main mkhtlf hayn: dakhl kryn: byan main dakhl karain niy ktaaryn ayk jdwl main dakhl karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔، byan main dakhl karnay sy mkhsawsa jdwl main niay rykarda shaml hawtay hayn۔ agar ayk hi bnyady klyd ya anwkhy rkawt kay sath ayk ktaar pehlay hi tybl main mwjwd hay tou ، byan ayk ghltay phynk dy ga aur andraj nakam hawjaiay gha۔ yeh byan aam tawr par jab aap chahti hain tou astamal kya jata haay۔mwjwdha rykardawn main trmym kyay baghair kesi tybl main niay dayta ko shaml karnay kay liay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda anrt saarfyn main (kstmr aai day ، nam ، ay myl) akdar (1 ، 'jan daw' ، 'john@example.com') ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، dakhl kryn۔byan main mkhsawsa akdar kay sath "saarfyn" tybl main kstmr ka ayk nya rykarda shaml krta haay۔ dwbarha jghha: tbdyl karain byan main niy ktaaryn kesi tybl main dakhl karnay ya mwjwdha ktaarwn ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay agar un ki bnyady klyd ya anwkhy rkawt haay۔ jbphansy di hogi ، byan main tbdyly tybl main ayk niy ktaar dakhl karnay ki kwshsh krty haay۔aghr ayk hi saf kay sath ayk hi praimry klyd ya mnfrd rkawt pehlay sy mwjwd hay tou ، isy pehlay hazaf krdya gaya hay ، aur phir niy ktaar dakhl krdy hogi haay۔ agar mwjwdha ktaar ko tbdyl krdya gaya hay tou ، byan main byan krdha koi bhi dusray kalm un ki pehlay sy taay shuda akdar par syt kyay jien ga yaNULL agar koi dayfalt wylyw ki wzuahat nahin ki jati haay۔ yeh byan aam tawr par astamal hawta hay jab aap nya dayta dakhl karna chahti hain lekin mwjwdha rykardawn ko bhi ap dayt karty hain agar woh pehlay sy mwjwd hayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwdar plys saarfyn main (kstmr aai day ، nam ، ay myl) akdar (1 ، 'jan daw'،' john@example.com ') ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، byan main tbdyl karain "saarfyn" tybl main kstmr ka nya rykarda dakhl karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔aghr ayk hi kstmr aai day wala saarf pehlay sy mwjwd hay tou ، is ki jghha niy akdar kay sath tbdyl krdy jaye ghy۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، byan main dakhl karnay kay liye niy ktaaryn ayk tybl main dakhl karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hain ، jabky tbdyl shuda byan main niy ktaaryn dakhl karnay ya mwjwdha ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ktaaryn bnyady klyd ya anwkhy rkawtwn par mbny hayn۔dwnwn byanat kay darmiyan antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hay keh aya aap mkml tawr par nya dayta dakhl karna chahti hain ya agar tnazaaat paiay jatay hain tou mwjwdha dayta ko tbdyl karna chahti hayn۔

Question: andrwny shmwlyt aur baien bazaw main shaml hony main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ap dayt byan aur hazaf karnay wala byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo kesi jdwl main dayta main trmym karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: ap dayt byan: tazaha kary ka byan kesi tybl ki ayk ya zayada ktaar main mwjwdha dayta main trmym karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ap dayt byan fraham krdha haaltwn ki bnyad par mntkhb ktaar main mkhsawsa kalmwn ki akdar ko tbdyl krta haay۔ ap dayt ka byan aap ko niy akdar kay sath mkhsawsa kalmwn ko ap dayt karnay ، azahaar ki bnyad par akdar ka hasab lghanay ، ya mwjwdha aadad wa shmar par afaal ka atalak karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ yeh aam tawr par tbdyly kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mwjwdha rykardawn main kuch kalmwn ki kdryn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda ap dayt saarfyn ay myl karain = 'newemail@example.com' jahan kstmr aai day = 1 ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، ap dayt byan kstmr aai day kay sath kstmr rykarda ki "ay myl" kalm wylyw main trmym krta haay۔1 "saarfyn" tybl myn۔ daylyt byan: hazaf shuda byan ko ayk tybl sy ayk ya zayada ktaaryn hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، hazaf shuda byan mstkl tawr par fraham krdha haaltwn ki bnyad par jdwl sy mkhsawsa ktaarwn ko hata dyta haay۔ hazaf byan krta haay۔ksy bhi kalmwn ki akdar ko tbdyl nah karain blkha is kay bjaiay pori ktaar ko hata dyta hay jo haalat sy mmasal haay۔ yeh aam tawr par kesi tybl sy napsndydha ya mtrwk rykardawn ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: ghahakwn sy SQLCOPY kwdaylyt jahan kstmr aai day = 1 ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ؛، hazaf karnay wala byan "saarfyn" tybl sy kstmr aai day 1 kay sath kstmr rykarda ko hata dyta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ap dayt byan ko mkhsawsa kalmwn ki akdar ko tbdyl krkay ayk tybl main mwjwdha dayta main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky hazaf shuda byan ko kesi ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ya kesi myza sy zayada ktaaryn۔tazaha kary ka byan tybl kay andr mwjwd dayta ko tbdyl krta hay ، jabky hazaf shuda byan mstkl tawr par tybl sy dayta ko hata dyta haay۔

Question: byrwny shmwlyt aur sahayha shmwlyt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: tybl tybl ka byan aur darap tybl byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo kesi dayta bys sy tybl ko hatanay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh un kay tarza aml aur un kay phansy kay ntaij main mkhtlf hayn: trnkyt tybl: trnkyt tybl byan A sy tamam ktaaryn hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jdwl kay dahanchay ko brkrar rkhtay hoey tybl۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، tybl tybl ka byan tybl kay andr mwjwd tamam aadad wa shmar ko hazaf krta hay ، mؤsar tarykay sy tybl ko apni abtdaiy haalt main dwbarha trtyb dyta haay۔tmam ktaarwn ko hatanay kay l. kywnkha yeh hr saf kay liye anfrady hazaf karnay wali karrwaiywn ko pyda nahin krta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، yeh tybl sy wabstha dayta safhaat ko khtm krta hay ، js kay ntyjay main tyza rftar amldraamd hawta haay۔ tybl ko tybl kay aatw ankrmnt kaؤntrza ko dwbarha trtyb dyta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh aghla dakhl karnay ka aml abtdaiy kdr sy shrwa hawgha۔msaal kay tawr par ، tybl tybl ka byan "saarfyn" tybl sy tamam ktaaryn hatata hay ، lekin tybl ka dahanchha brkrar rhata haay۔ darap tybl: darap tybl ka byan dayta bys sy tybl aur is sy wabstha tamam dayta ko mkml tawr par hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔darap tybl astytmnt mstkl tawr par is ki sakht ، asharyha jat ، rkawtyn ، aur is sy wabstha dayta smyt pori jdwl ko hazaf krdyta haay۔ darap tybl ayk day day ayl byan hay js ko waps nahin laya jaskta hay ، lhazaa isy ahatyata kay sath astamal kya jana chahaiay kywnkha is sy nakabl wapsy dayta nksaan hawta haay۔ghra diya jata hay ، is kay andr mwjwd tamam aadad wa shmar zuaia hawchkay hain aur byk ap kay baghair bazayaft nahin hawsktay hayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwdadarwp tybl saarfyn ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، darap tybl ka byan poray "saarfyn" tybl ko dayta bys sy hata dyta hay ، js main is ki sakht aur sab shaml hayn۔as kay andr mhafwza krdha dayta۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، trashay hoey tybl ka byan is kay dahanchay ko brkrar rkhtay hoey tamam ktaarwn ko ayk tybl sy hatata hay ، jabky darap tybl ka byan tybl ko mkml tawr par hatata hay ، js main is ki sakht aur is sy wabstha tamam aadad wa shmar shaml hayn۔trashay hoey tybl tyza tr hay lekin aatw ankrmnt kaؤntrza ko dwbarha trtyb nahin dyta hay ، jabky darap tybl nakabl wapsy hay aur mstkl tawr par tybl aur is kay mndrjat ko hazaf krdyta haay۔

Question: ywnyn aur ywnyn kay tamam byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: tkhlyk tybl ka byan aur altr tybl byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo kesi jdwl ki sakht main trmym karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh apnay mksad main mkhtlf hain aur jab woh aam tawr par astamal hawtay hayn: tybl bnaiyn: tybl astytmnt ko ayk nya tybl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk dayta bys۔ jab aml main laya gaya tou ، tybl tybl byan tybl kay dahanchay ki wzuahat krta hay ، js main kalm kay nam ، dayta ki aksam ، rkawtyn aur asharyha shaml hayn۔ yeh kesi tybl ki abtdaiy sakht ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawta hay jab yeh dayta bys main mwjwd nahin haay۔tybl aam tawr par is wkt astamal kya jata hay jab aap nya tybl bnana chahti hain aur is kay kalmwn aur khsawsayat ki wzuahat karna chahti hayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY CodeCreate tybl saarfyn (kstmr ID INT praimry klyd ، nam wrchar (50) ، ay myl wrchr (100)) ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ،tybl astytmnt bnaiyn tyn kalmwn kay sath ayk nya "saarfyn" tybl tyar krta haay: "kstmr aai day" ، "nam" ، aur "ay myl"aap ko kesi mwjwdha tybl ki kalmwn ، trmym ya hatanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ayk mwjwdha jdwl ، jesay kalmwn ko shaml karna ya ghra dena ، kalm dayta ki aksam ko tbdyl karna ، ya rkawtyn shaml krna۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwdayltr tybl kay saarfyn kalm aydarys wrchr (200) shaml karain ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، altr tybl byan main ayk nya kalm "aydarys" shaml kya gaya hay "aydarys"mwjwdha "saarfyn" tybl kay mtaabk۔ khlasaha karain ، tkhlyk tybl byan ko is kay abtdaiy dahanchay kay sath ayk nya tybl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky altr tybl byan kesi mwjwdha tybl ki sakht main trmym karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔tkhlyk tybl ko pehli bar kesi tybl ki wzuahat karty wkt astamal kya jata hay ، jabky altr tybl ko kesi mwjwdha tybl main dwbarha bnanay kay baghair tbdylyan karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: ayk ghnty aur rkm kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys ka byan aur darap dayta bys byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo baltrtyb dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main dayta bys bnanay aur chhwranay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wha apnay mksad aur un kay kamwn main mkhtlf hain jo woh anjam dytay hayn: dayta bys bnaiyn: dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye dayta bys ka byan astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml draamd kya jata hay tou ، dayta bys ka byan mkhsawsa nam kay sath ayk nya khaly dayta bys tshkyl dyta haay۔dayta bys ka wjwd ، aur is main aam tawr par abtdaiy dayta bys dahanchha trtyb dena shaml hay ، jesay sstm tyblza bnana aur astwryj ki jghha mkhtsa krna۔ dayta bys bnanay kay liye mkhsawsa nhaw aur akhtyarat dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay mtaabk mkhtlf hawsktay hayn۔myDatabase ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، dayta bys ka byan "myDatabase" kay nam sy ayk nya dayta bys tshkyl dyta haay۔ darap dayta bys: darap dayta bys ka byan dayta bys mynjmnt sstm sy dayta bys ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dayta bys aur is sy wabstha tamam jdwlyn ، aaraa ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar aur dyghr ashyaa۔ yeh dayta bys kay andr mwjwd tamam dayta aur dahanchay ko nakabl tlafy tawr par hatata haay۔ dayta bys ko ghranay kay liye mkhsawsa nhaw aur akhtyarat dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay astamal par mnhasar hawsktay hayn۔ays kyw ayl kwpy kwdadarwp dayta bys maiy dayta bys ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، darap dayta bys ka byan "maiy dayta bys" dayta bys aur is sy wabstha tamam ashyaa ko hazaf krta haay۔ khlasaha karain ، dayta bys ka byan ayk nya dayta bys tshkyl dyta hay ، jabky darap dayta bys ko ayk mwjwdha dayta bys ko hata dyta hay aur is main sabhi sab kuch hata dyta haay۔wabstha ashyaadayta bys bnaiyn dayta bys kay abtdaiy dahanchay aur wjwd ko kaim krta hay ، jabky darap dayta bys mstkl tawr par poray dayta bys aur is kay tamam mndrjat ko hazaf krta haay۔

Question: zayada sy zayada aur ayk mnt kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: byk ap dayta bys ka byan aur bhaaly dayta bys byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo dayta bys kay liye byk ap anjam denay aur aapryshnza ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wha apnay mksad aur un kay anjam denay waly akdamat main mkhtlf hayn: byk ap dayta bys: byk ap dayta bys ka byan kesi dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، byk ap dayta bys ka byan dayta bys kay dayta aur askyma ki ayk kapy tyar krta hay ، js sy byk ap fail tyar hawty haay۔byk ap syt۔ byk ap fail ko dayta kay thafza aur nzaam ki nakamy ki sawrt main dayta kay thafza aur bazayaby ko ykyny bnanay kay liye mkhtlf mkam ، aalha ، ya mydaya main mhafwza kya jaskta haay۔ dayta bys ka byk ap lenay kay liye mkhsawsa nhaw aur akhtyarat dayta bys kay antzaam kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hawsktay hayn۔sstm ko astamal kya jarhaa haay۔ msaal kay tawr par (maiykrwsaft ays kyw ayl srwr): SQLCOPY kwda byk ap dayta bys MyDatabase to Disk = 'C: \ byk ap \ myDatabase.bak' ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، byk ap dayta bys byan "myDatabase" dayta bys ka byk ap tshkyl dyta hay aur isy astwr krta haay۔mkhsawsa byk ap fail myn۔ rysstwr dayta bys myn: bhaaly dayta bys kay byan ko byk ap fail ya byk ap syt sy dayta bys ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، rystwr dayta bys ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys ki jghha la lyta hay ya rn sy dayta aur askyma ka astamal karty hoey ayk nya dayta bys bnata haay۔byk ap fail daat aai ty dayta bys ko pchhly ryast main lwtata hay ، js main byk ap kay wkt mwjwd dayta aur dahanchay ki bazayaby hawty haay۔ dayta bys ko bhaal karnay kay liye mkhsawsa nhaw aur akhtyarat dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay astamal kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hawsktay hayn۔srwr): SQLCOPY kwdarstwr dayta bys MyDatabase from Disk = 'C: \ byk ap \ myDatabase.bak' ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، bhaaly dayta bys ka byan mkhsawsa byk ap fail sy dayta aur askyma ka astamal karty hoey "MyDatabase" dayta bys ko bhaal krta haay۔byk ap dayta bys ka byan dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky bhaaly dayta bys kay byan ko byk ap fail sy dayta bys ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔byk ap dayta bys dayta prwtykshn kay liye dayta bys ki ayk kapy tyar krta hay ، jabky dayta bys ko bhaal karain ayk dayta bys ko byk ap sy dayta aur askyma ka astamal karty hoey pchhly ryast main tbdyl krta haay۔

Question: kesi aardar kay zaryaha aur had kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ghrant ka byan aur mnswkh byan ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main ajazat aur mraaat kay antzaam kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an kay braks afaal hain aur woh dayta bys aabjykt tak rsaiy kay hakwk ki mnzawry aur mnswkh karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn: ghrant byan: ghrant ka byan kesi dayta bys main saarfyn ya saarf kay krdar ko mkhsawsa ajazat ya mraaat denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml draamd hawta hay tou ، ghrant ka byan saarfyn ya krdar ki ajazat dyta haay۔mkhsawsa dayta bys aabjykt ، jesay tyblza ، aaraa ، tarykha kar ، ya kalmwn par kuch aamal anjam denay kay l users saarfyn ko mkhsawsa ashyaa kay dayta aur dahanchay tak rsaiy ، trmym karnay ya un main hayra phyry karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔ mkhsawsa nhaw aur ajazat denay kay liye akhtyarat mkhtlf hawsktay hayn۔dayta bys mynjmnt sstm par astamal kya jarhaa haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY Codgrant mntkhb karain ، saarfyn ko saarf 1 main dakhl karain ؛ mndrjha bala msaal main ، ghrant ka byan "saarf" tybl par "saarf" ko mntkhb karain aur dakhl karain ، js sy inhain prahnay ki ajazat di jaskay aur inhain prahnay ki ajazat di jaiay۔jdwl main dayta dakhl kryn۔ rywkyt byan: mnswkh karnay wala byan kesi dayta bys main saarfyn ya saarf kay krdarwn sy pehlay dyiay gaye ajazat ya mraaat ko mnswkh karnay ya isy hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، un ki rsaiy ko mhadwd karty hoey ، un tak rsaiy ko mhadwd karty hoey ، un ki rsaiy ko mhadwd karty hayn۔wabstha dayta bys aabjykt kay liay۔ yeh ghrant kay byan kay zaryaha dyiay gaye mraaat ko mؤsar tarykay sy khtm krdyta hay aur saarfyn ko mnswkh shuda ashyaa par mkhsawsa akdamat karnay sy rwkta haay۔ mkhsawsa nhaw aur ajazat ko mnswkh karnay kay liye akhtyarat dayta bys kay antzaam kay nzaam kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hawsktay hayn۔ msaal: SQLCOPY: SQLCOPYkwdayrwwk mntkhb karain ، saarf 1 sy saarfyn par dakhl kryn۔ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، rykwik byan "saarf" sy pehlay dyiay gaye slykt aur dakhl krdha ajazatwn ko mnswkh krta hay ، js sy tybl main dayta prahnay aur dakhl karnay ki un ki salahayt ko hata diya jata haay۔ khlasaha kryn۔، ghrant kay byan ka astamal saarfyn ya krdarwn ko ajazat ya mraaat denay kay liye kya jata hay ، js sy woh mkhsawsa dayta bys ashyaa par karrwaiy aur karrwaiy karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔as kay braks ، mnswkh karnay waly byan ka astamal pehlay sy dyiay gaye ajazatwn ko mnswkh karnay ya door karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، js sy mtalkha ashyaa tak saarf ki rsaiy ko mhadwd kya jata haay۔ghrant ka byan rsaiy ko kabl bnata hay ، jabky mnswkh karnay wala byan rsaiy ko mhadwd krta haay۔

Question: bwlyn aur wrchr dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: flsh mraaat ka byan aur flsh tyblza ka byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: flsh mraaat: flsh mraaat ka byan dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main asthakak ki myzawn ko dwbarha lwda karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh aam tawr par is kay bad astamal hawta haay۔saarfyn ya krdarwn ki taraf sy mraaat dena ya un ki mnswkhy ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh tbdylyan fwry tawr par nafza hawjaiyn۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، flsh mraaat ka byan dayta bys mynjmnt sstm ko dask sy tazaha trien asthakak ki myzawn ko dwbarha prahnay aur tbdylywn ka atalak karnay par mjbwr krta haay۔ yeh aam tawr par mil kar astamal hawta haay۔ghrant aur kaladm byanat kay sath yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye keh asthakak ki tbdylywn ko fwry tawr par dayta bys sstm kay zaryaha tslym kya jata haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwdaflwsh mraaat ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، flsh mraaat ka byan asthakak ki myzawn ko dwbarha lwda krta hay ، js sy haalyha asthakak ki tbdylywn ka asar prata haay۔ flsh tyblza:flsh tyblza kay byan ko dayta bys main tamam jdwlwn ko band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh ykyny bnata hay keh tyblza sy wabstha kesi bhi zayr altwaa tbdylywn ya kychda dayta ko flsh kya jata hay aur dask par lkha jata haay۔tmam khly myzayn band krdyty hain ، jo dayta bys par byk ap bnana ya bhaaly kay kam anjam denay jesay haalat main karaamd saabt hawskty hayn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh flsh tyblza ka byan mkml dayta bys sht daaؤn anjam nahin dyta hay ya poray dayta bys kyshay ko saaf nahin krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr۔ays kyw ayl kwpy kwdaflsh tyblza ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، flsh tyblza ka byan tamam jdwlwn ko band aur dwbarha khwlta hay ، talay jary krta hay aur is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh kesi bhi zayr altwaa tbdylyan dask par phyl jaiyn۔saarf kay mraaat main tbdylyan ، jabky flsh tyblza ka byan tyblza ko band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh zayr altwaa tbdylyan khtm hawjaiyn aur tybl talay jary hawn۔flsh mraaat asthakak main tbdylywn sy mtalk hain ، jabky flsh tyblza tybl lywl aapryshnza aur dayta flshngh sy mtalk hayn۔

Question: INT aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: shw tyblza ka byan aur byan krdha tybl byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo dayta bys tyblza kay baray main malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain ، lekin woh un ki fraham krdha malwmat main mkhtlf hayn: tyblza dkhaiyn: shw tyblza ka byan dayta bys main jdwlwn ki fharst zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔. jab phansy di jati hay tou ، shw tyblza ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys main tamam jdwlwn kay namwn par mushtamil ntyjha syt lwtata haay۔ yeh dayta bys main dstyab jdwlwn ka ayk aaly stahay nzaarha fraham krta hay ، js kay baray main aap ko tybl kay namwn ko fwry tawr par dykhnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔an ka dahanchha ya kalm۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwda shw tyblza ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، shw tyblza ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys main jdwlwn ki ayk fharst bazayaft krta haay۔ksy khasa jdwl ki sakht kay baray main tfsayly malwmat zaahar karnay kay liay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، tybl ka byan byan kalm ، dayta ki aksam ، rkawtwn aur mkhsawsa jdwl ki dyghr khsawsayat kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔ yeh tybl kay dahanchay ka ayk jama nzaarha dyta hay ، js sy aap ko ajazat mlty haaykalm kay namwn ، un kay dayta ki aksam ، aur un par laghw hony wali kesi bhi rkawtwn ko smjhnay kay liay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY CODEDSCRIBE saarfyn ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، tybl byan byan "saarfyn" tybl kay baray main tfsayly malwmat haasal krta hay ، bshmwl is kay kalm ، dayta ki ksmyn ، awrrkawtyn۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، shw tyblza ka byan dayta bys main jdwlwn ki ayk fharst fraham krta hay ، jabky byan krdha tybl byan ayk mkhsawsa jdwl ki sakht kay baray main tfsayly malwmat fraham krta haay۔shw tyblza tybl kay namwn ka ayk aaly stahay nzaarha pysh karty hain ، jabky tybl ki wzuahat kalmwn ، dayta ki aksam aur rkawtwn kay baray main jama malwmat fraham krty haay۔

Question: mtn aur blab dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: shw dayta bys ka byan aur astamal dayta bys ka byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: dayta bys dkhaiyn: dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main dstyab dayta bys ki fharst ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔shw dayta bys ka byan sstm main mwjwd tamam dayta bys kay namwn par mushtamil ntyjha syt lwtata haay۔ yeh dayta bys ka ayk aaly stahay nzaarha fraham krta hay ، js sy aap un kay sath braha rast bat chyt kyay baghair dayta bys kay namwn ko dykhnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔mzakwrha bala msaal kay tawr par ، shw dayta bys byan dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main dstyab dayta bys ki ayk fharst bazayaft krta haay۔dayta bys btawr dayfalt dayta bys kay bad ays kyw ayl kay byanat kay liay۔ yeh aap ko hr byan main dayta bys kay nam ka wazuha tawr par hawalha kyay baghair mntkhb krdha dayta bys kay andr tyblza ، aaraa aur dyghr ashyaa kay sath kam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ dayta bys ko tbdyl karnay kay liye mkhsawsa nhaw dayta bys mynjmnt kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hawskta haay۔sstm ko astamal kya jarhaa haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY Codeuse MyDatabase ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، astamal dayta bys ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys syak wa sbak ko "MyDatabase" main tbdyl krta hay ، js sy bad main ays kyw ayl kay byanat ko is dayta bys kay andr kam karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔ khlasaha karain ، dayta bys ka byan ayk fharst fraham krta haay۔sstm main dstyab dayta bys ، jabky astamal kay dayta bys ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys kay syak wa sbak ko ayk mkhsawsa dayta bys main tbdyl krta hay ، js kay ntyjay main ays kyw ayl kay bad kay byanat ko is dayta bys main kam karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔dkhaiyn dayta bys dayta bys kay namwn ka ayk aaly stahay nzaarha pysh krta hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys kay bad kay ays kyw ayl kay byanat kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda dayta bys ka tayn krta haay۔

Question: flwt aur dabl dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: shw ghrant ka byan aur shw mtghyr byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: ghrant dkhaiyn: shw ghrant byan ko kesi mkhsawsa saarf ya krdar ko dyiay gaye mraaat aur ajazat kay baray main malwmat haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dayta bys۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، shw ghrant ka byan ayk mkhsawsa saarf ya krdar ko tfwyzu krdha mraaat ki nmaish karnay wala ntyjha syt lwtata haay۔ yeh is baray main tfsayly malwmat fraham krta hay keh saarf ya krdar ko mkhtlf dayta bys aabjykt par anjam denay ki ajazat haay۔dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay astamal par mnhasar haay۔mtghyrat dkhaiyn: dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main mwjwdha trtyb mtghyrat kay baray main malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye shw mtghyr byan ka astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml main laya jata hay tou ، shw mtghyr ka byan sstm ki trtybat kay baray main tfsaylat fraham krta haay۔ yeh sstm ki trtybat kay baray main tfsaylat fraham krta haay۔، jesay srwr sy mtalk knfyghryshn kay akhtyarat ، mahawlyaty mtghyrat ، ya aalmy mtghyrat۔ mtghyr ko zaahar karnay kay liye mkhsawsa nhaw dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay astamal par mnhasar hawskta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par 'myks_kwnykykshnza' jesay 'myks_kwnykykshnza' ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal kay tawr par ، shw ayl kwpy kwda shw mtghyrat۔mtghyrat ka byan "myks_kwnshnza" sstm mtghyr ki mwjwdha kymt ko bazayaft krta hay ، jo dayta bys srwr kay zaryaha ajazat di janay wali byk wkt rabtawn ki zayada sy zayada tadad ka tayn krta haay۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، shw ghrant ka byan saarf ya krdar ko dyiay gaye mraaat kay baray main malwmat haasal krta hay ، jabky is shw ko zaahar krta haay۔mtghyrat ka byan dayta bys sstm main mwjwdha knfyghryshn mtghyr kay baray main malwmat haasal krta haay۔shw ghrant saarf ki ajazatwn aur mraaat par mrkwza hay ، jabky shw mtghyr sstm ki trtyb ki trtybat kay baray main tfsaylat fraham krta haay۔

Question: bwlyn aur tyny ant dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: wzuahat byan aur tjzayha tybl byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main swalat aur jdwlwn kay baray main malwmat aktha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: wzuahat: wzuahat byan kesi astfsar kay aml kay mnsawbay ka tjzayha karnay aur zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aml draamd ، wzuahat byan is baray main bsayrt fraham krta hay keh dayta bys aaptymaizar astfsar ko anjam denay aur bnyady aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy haasal karnay ka aradha rkhta haay۔ yeh tybl main shaml hony ، asharyha kay astamal ، rsaiy kay tarykwn aur dyghr tfsaylat kay baray main malwmat waps krta hay jo yeh smjhnay main mdd krta hay keh astfsar kesay hawghaphansy di ghiy۔ wzuahat byan kay zaryaha fraham krdha mkhsawsa nhaw aur tfsayl ki staha dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay astamal kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hawskty haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY Codexplain * saarfyn sy mntkhb karain jahan amr> 30 ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، amldraamd kay mnsawbay ka tjzayha kya gaya haay۔dyiay gaye mntkhb astfsar kay liye ، is baray main tfsaylat fraham karna keh dayta bys mkhsawsa haaltwn ki bnyad par dayta ko kis tarah bazayaft kray gha۔ tjzayha tybl: tjzayha tybl ka byan kesi tybl kay dayta aur andayks tksym kay baray main aadad wa shmar ko ap dayt karnay aur jma karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aml draamd kya gaya tou tjzayha tyblbyan tybl kay dayta ki tksym ، kardanlty aur dyghr aadadwshmar ki tfsaylat kay baray main malwmat aktha krta haay۔ yeh dayta bys aaptymaizar ko astfsar par aml draamd kay mnsawbwn ، asharyha kay astamal ، aur dyghr asalaha ki hakmt amlywn kay baray main bakhbr fysalay karnay main mdd krta haay۔ tjzayha tybl kay byan kay zaryaha fraham krdha mkhsawsa trkyb aur tfsaylat mkhtlf hawskty hayn۔dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay astamal par mnhasar haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: SQLCOPY kwdaynlyza tybl saarfyn ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، tjzayha tybl byan "saarfyn" tybl kay baray main aadad wa shmar aur malwmat ko ap dayt krta hay ، js sy dayta bys aaptymaizar ko is kay khlaf bhatr fysalay karnay kay kabl bnata hay jab is kay khlaf swalat par aml draamd karty hayn۔jdwl۔ khlasaha karain keh ، wzuahat byan kesi swal kay amldraamd kay mnsawbay ka tjzayha aur dasplay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js sy yeh bsayrt fraham ki jati hay keh dayta bys astfsar ko kis tarah anjam dy gha۔dwsry taraf ، tjzayha tybl ka byan kesi tybl kay dayta aur andayks tksym kay baray main aadadwshmar ko ap dayt karnay aur jma karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js sy is tybl kay khlaf swalat par aml draamd karty wkt dayta bys aaptymaizar ko bhatr fysalay karnay main mdd mlty haay۔wzuahat astfsar par aml draamd kay mnsawbwn par mrkwza hay ، jabky tjzayha tybl tybl kay aadadwshmar aur dayta ki tksym par mrkwza haay۔

Answer: zayada tr dayta bys sstm main ، ayk tykst dayta ki ksm aur blab (bainry braay aabjykt) dayta ki ksm mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt krty hay jab bray mkdar main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay ki bat aaty haay: mtn: tykst dayta ki ksm kryktr ya strngh dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha aam tawr par bray mkdar main mtny malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jesay mtn kay pyraghraf ، dstawyzaat

Answer: zayada tr prwghramngh zabanwn aur dayta bys sstm main ، flwt dayta ki ksm aur dabl dayta ki ksm ka astamal flwtngh pwaint nmbr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، lekin woh sahat sy mtalk aur astwryj ki zurwryat kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn: flwt: flwt dayta ki ksm ayk wahad sahat sy mtalk flwtngh haay۔pwaint nmbras ki nmaindghy aam tawr par mymwry kay 32 bts ka astamal karty hoey ki jati hay ، js ki wjha sy yeh ayk khasa staha ki sahat sy mtalk akdar ki ayk mhadwd had ko zakhyrha karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔flwt wylyw ki sahat sy mtalk tkryba 7 7 aasharyha handsay hayn۔flwt zayada tr amwmy mksad kay flwtngh pwaint kay hasab kay liye mwzawn hay jahan sahat sy mtalk aaly daghry ki zurwrt nahin haay۔flwt akdar ki msaalwn main 3.14 ، -0.5 ، ya 10000.0. dabl shaml hayn: dabl dayta ki ksm dabl sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint nmbr haay۔mymwry kay 64 bts ka astamal karty hoey is ki nmaindghy ki jati hay ، jo flwt kay mkablay main aaly sahat sy mtalk fraham krty haay۔dabl wylyw ki sahat sy mtalk tkryba 15 15 aasharyha handsay hayn۔dabl aksar astamal kya jata hay jab sahat sy mtalk aaly staha ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jesay sainsy hasab ، maly drkhwastwn ، ya aysay haalat main jahan drstghy zurwry haay۔dabl akdar ki msaalwn main 3.14159 ، -0.577 ، ya 100000.0.0.in ka khlasaha shaml hay ، flwt aur dabl dayta ki aksam kay darmiyan bnyady frk sahat sy mtalk aur astwryj ki zurwryat ki staha haay۔flwt 32 bts ka astamal krta hay aur is ki kam sahat sy mtalk 7 aasharyha handswn ki kam sahat sy mtalk hay ، jabky dabl 64 bts astamal krta hay aur tkryba 15 15 aasharyha handswn ki aaly sahat sy mtalk pysh krta haay۔an kay darmiyan antkhab drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur sahat sy mtalk mtalwbha staha par mnhasar haay۔

Answer: zayada tr prwghramngh zabanwn aur dayta bys sstm main ، bwlyn ya mntaky akdar ki nmaindghy karnay ki bat karnay par ayk bwlyn dayta taip aur ayk tyny ant dayta taip mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt krta haay: bwlyn: bwlyn dayta ki ksm mntaky akdar ki nmaindghy krty hay ، aam tawr par sahayha ya ghlta۔as ka astamal bainry ryastwn ya haalat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata hay jahan ntyjha ya tou sahayha ya ghalat hawskta haay۔bwlyn akdar aksar mntaky karrwaiywn ، mshrwta byanat aur mwazanha main astamal hawtay hayn۔kchh prwghramngh zabanwn main ، bwlyn ki nmaindghy dusray mtalwbha alfaza jesay bwl ya bt jesay bhi ki jaskty haay۔bwlyn akdar ki msaalwn main sch aur ghalat shaml hayn۔ tynyint: dusri taraf ، tainnt dayta ki ksm ، ayk 8 bt antyjr dayta taip hay jo -128 sy 127 (ya agar dstkhta shuda haay) tak ki addy akdar ko -128 sy 127 tak mhafwza rakh sakti haay۔aghrchha tainynt bnyady tawr par chhwty antyjr akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، lekin yeh aksar bwlyn akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye bhi astamal hawta haay۔rwayty tawr par ، 0 ko ghalat smjha jata hay ، aur kesi bhi ghair safr ki kymt ko sch smjha jata haay۔lhazaa ، amly tawr par ، tnyynt ko 0 aur schay kay liye 1 tfwyzu krkay bwlyn akdar ki tklyd kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha addy hayra phyry kay lhaaza sy zayada lchk pysh krta hay aur agar zurwrt ho tou ryazuy ki karrwaiywn main astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، bwlyn aur tnyynt dayta ki aksam kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh bwlyn khasa tawr par mntaky akdar (sahayha ya ghlta) ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jabky tainnt haay۔ayk chhwty sy antyjr dayta taip jo knwnshn kay zaryaha bwlyn akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hay (aam tawr par 0 ko ghalat aur ghair safr akdar kay liye sch kay liye astamal karty hayn)۔an kay darmiyan antkhab prwghramngh zaban ki mkhsawsa zurwryat ya astamal hony waly dayta bys sstm par mnhasar haay۔

Question: mtn aur blab dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: zayada tr prwghramngh zabanwn aur dayta bys sstm main ، ayk INT (INTEGER) dayta ki ksm aur ayk bghynt dayta taip antyjr akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، lekin woh apni had aur astwryj ki zurwryat kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn: INT (INTEGER): INT dayta taip aam tawr par nmaindghy krta haay۔ayk 32 bt par dstkhta shuda addy۔yha tkryba -2.1 blyn sy 2.1 blyn (ya -2^31 sy 2^31 -1) tak ki pori tadad ko mhafwza krskta haay۔INT aam tawr par aatdal psnd hadwd main addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha had aur astwryj ki karkrdghy kay mabyn ayk twazan pysh krta haay۔INT akdar ki msaalwn main -100 ، 0 ، 42 ، ya 1000.bigint: dusri taraf ، bghynt dayta ki ksm ، bray addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayzaain ki hogi haay۔yha aam tawr par ayk 64 bt par dstkhta shuda addy ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js ki mdd sy is main tkryba -9.2 kwintylyn sy la kar 9.2 kwintylyn (ya -2^63 sy 2^63 -1) ki pori tadad mwjwd haay۔jb aap ko antyjr akdar ko snbhalnay ki zurwrt hawty hay jo INT dayta taip ki had sy tjawza karty ho tou bghnt ka astamal kya jata haay۔yha ayk bohat bray rynj mhaya krta hay lekin is main zayada astwryj ki jghha ki zurwrt hawty haay۔bray akdar ki msaalwn main -100000000000000 ، 0 ، 123456789 ، ya 100000000000000.in ka khlasaha shaml hay ، INT aur BIGINT dayta ki aksam kay darmiyan bnyady frk un ki had aur astwryj ki zurwryat haay۔INT ayk aatdal psnd had kay sath 32 bt par dstkhta shuda add ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jabky bghynt ayk 64 bt par dstkhta shuda addy ki nmaindghy krta hay js main bohat bray rynj hawty haay۔an kay darmiyan antkhab drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur addy akdar ki wsat par mnhasar hay jsay zakhyrha karnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: flwt aur dabl dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: zayada tr prwghramngh zabanwn aur dayta bys sstm main ، tarykh aur awkat ki nmaindghy karnay ki bat ki janay par tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt krty haay: tarykh: tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm kesi bhi wkt ki malwmat kay baghair sirf tarykh kay jzaw ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha aam tawr par YYYY-MM-DD ki shkl main tarykhwn ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jahan YYYY sal ki nshandhay krta hay ، aym aym mhaynay ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur day day is dn ki nmaindghy krta haay۔jb aap ko mkhsawsa awkat sy aazaadanha tawr par tarykhwn kay sath kam karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam mwzawn hawty hayn۔wha tarykh kay mwazanha ، tarykh ryazuy ، aur tarykh ki shkl sazay jesay kamwn ki ajazat dytay hayn۔tarykh ki akdar ki msaalwn main '2023-06-23' ، '1990-01-01' ، ya '1776-07-04'.datime shaml hayn: dusri taraf ، dayt taim dayta ki ksm tarykh aur wkt dono ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayzaain ki hogi haay۔malwmat.yha wkt main ayk khasa nktaha ki nmaindghy krta hay js main syknda tak sahat sy mtalk hawta haay۔dayt taim akdar ka farmyt aam tawr par YYYY-MM-DD HH: MM: SS hawta hay ، jahan azuafy HH ghhntha ki nmaindghy krta hay (24 ghhntay ki shkl myn) ، aym aym mnt ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur ays ays dusray ki nmaindghy krta haay۔jb aap ko tarykhwn aur awkat dono kay sath mil kar kam karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou dayt taim dayta ki aksam mfyd hayn۔wha tarykh aur wkt kay hasab ktab ، mwazanha aur farmytngh jesay kamwn ki ajazat dytay hayn۔dayt taim akdar ki msaalwn main '2023-06-23 12:30:00' ، '1990-01-01 08:15:30' ، ya '2022-12-31 23: 59: 59'.in ka khlasaha shaml haay۔tarykh aur dayt taim dayta ki aksam kay darmiyan frk yeh hay keh tarykh kesi bhi wkt ki malwmat kay baghair ، tarykh kay jzaw ki nmaindghy krty hay ، jabky dayt taim tarykh aur wkt dono ajzaaa kay sath wkt main ayk khasa nktaha ki nmaindghy krta haay۔an kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay aur chahaay aap ko sirf tarykhwn kay sath kam karnay ki zurwrt hay ya dono tarykhwn aur awkat۔

Question: aasharyha aur addy aadad wa shmar ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: zayada tr prwghramngh zabanwn aur dayta bys sstm main ، wkt sy mtalkha malwmat ki nmaindghy karnay ki bat karnay par ayk taim dayta taip aur taim astymp dayta taip mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: wkt: wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm kesi tarykh kay jzaw kay baghair wkt ki akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔yha aam tawr par dn kay ayk mkhsawsa wkt ki nmaindghy krta hay farmyt aksar YYYY-MM-DD HH: MM: SS hawta hay ، jahan azuafy HH ghhntha ki nmaindghy krta hay (24 ghhntay ki shkl myn) ، aym aym mnt ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur ays ays dusray ki nmaindghy krta
