kay sath kam karnay ki zurwrt hay ya dono tarykh aur wkt ayk sath mil kr۔

Question: char aur wrchr dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: zayada tr dayta bys sstm main ، ayk sal kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm aur tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl krty hay jab aarzuy malwmat ki nmaindghy karnay ki bat aaty haay: sal: sal kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm khasa tawr par kesi tarykh kay sirf sal kay jzaw ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye tyar ki hogi haay۔as ka astamal brswn ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye kya jata hay jesay char handswn ki akdar ، jesay '1990' ، '2023' ، ya '1776'۔sal kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam aam tawr par kesi mhaynay ya dn kay ajzaaa kay baghair sirf sal ki malwmat ko mhafwza krty hayn۔wha aam tawr par un haalat main astamal hawtay hain jahan aap ko mkhsawsa tarykhwn sy aazaadanha tawr par sal ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay aur jwra twra karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔sal ki akdar ki msaalwn main '2023' ، '1990' ، ya '1776'.date shaml hayn: dusri taraf ، tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki ksm ، sal ، mhaynha aur dn kay ajzaaa smyt mkml tarykhwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha ayk mkhsawsa kylndar ki tarykh ki nmaindghy krta haay۔tarykh ki akdar aam tawr par 'Yyyy-mm-DD' jesay farmyt main mhafwza ki jati hain ، jahan 'Yyyy' sal ki nshandhay krta hay ، 'aym aym' mhaynay ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur 'day day' dn ki nmaindghy krta haay۔tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam ko tarykh kay mwazanha ، ryazuy ، farmytngh ، aur mkhsawsa ajzaaa ki khwj jesay kamwn ki ajazat dyta haay۔tarykh ki akdar ki msaalwn main '2023-06-23' ، '1990-01-01' ، ya '1776-07-04'.in ka khlasaha shaml hay ، sal aur tarykh kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam kay darmiyan bnyady frk sirf sal sirf sal haay۔tarykh ka jzaw ، jabky tarykh sal ، mhaynha aur dn kay ajzaaa kay sath ayk mkml tarykh ki nmaindghy krty haay۔an kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay aur chahaay aap ko sirf sal ki akdar kay sath kam karnay ki zurwrt ho ya tarykhwn ko mkml kryn۔

Question: bnyady klyd aur ayk anwkhy klyd main kya frk haay؟
Answer: zayada tr dayta bys sstm main ، pehlay sy taay shuda akdar kay ayk syt ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye ayk aynm dayta taip aur ayk syt dayta ki ksm ka astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh apnay astamal aur lchk kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn: ENUM: ENUM dayta ki ksm mjrd akdar kay ayk syt ki nmaindghy krty hay js ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔tybl tkhlyk kay dwran۔yha aap ko mmknha akdar ki fharst ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، aur aynwm dayta taip ka hr kalm un pehlay sy taay shuda akdar main sy kesi ayk ko astwr krskta haay۔ENUM akdar ko aam tawr par dawr ya add kay tawr par pysh kya jata haay۔jb aap aynwm kalm ki wzuahat karty hain tou ، aap wazuha tawr par ajazat shuda akdar ki fharst dytay hayn۔anwm akdar ki msaalyn 'srkh' ، 'sbza' ، 'nylay' rnghwn ya 'aydamn' ، 'saarf' ، 'mhaman' kay liye saarf kay krdar kay liye hawskty hayn۔ aynwm kay astamal ka faidha yeh hay keh yeh is par pabndy laga kar dayta ki salmyt ko ykyny bnata haaykalm sirf ayk mkhsawsa akdar ko kbwl karnay kay liay۔taham ، khraby yeh hay keh pehlay sy taay shuda akdar ko shaml karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye tybl dahanchay main rdwbdl ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jo bwjhl hawskta haay۔ syt: dusri taraf ، syt dayta ki ksm mjrd akdar kay ayk syt ki nmaindghy krty hay jahan ayk sath mtadd akdar ka antkhab kya jaskta haay۔yha aap ko mmknha akdar ki fharst ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، aur syt dayta taip ka hr kalm un main sy ayk ya zayada sy zayada akdar ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔syt akdar ko aam tawr par dawr ya add kay tawr par pysh kya jata haay۔jb aap kesi syt kalm ki wzuahat karty hain tou ، aap wazuha tawr par kesi ENUM ki tarah ki ajazat shuda akdar ki fharst dytay hayn۔syt wylyw ki msaalyn 'pyr' ، 'bdh' ، 'jmaha' haftha kay dn ya 'anghryzay' ، 'haspanwy' ، 'fransysy' zaban ki trjyhaat kay liye hawskty hayn۔ syt ko astamal karnay ka faidha yeh hay keh yeh mtadd akdar ki ajazat dyta haay۔ayk hi kalm main zakhyrha karnay kay liye ، jo mtadd akhtyarat kay sath safat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye karaamd saabt hawskta haay۔taham ، aynwm ki tarah ، pehlay sy taay shuda akdar main rdwbdl kay liye tybl dahanchay main rdwbdl ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، ENUM aur syt dayta ki aksam kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh ENUM ayk syt sy ayk hi pysh wzuahaty kymt ka antkhab karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jabky syt ayk ya zayada sy zayada pehlay sy taay shuda antkhab ki ajazat dyta haay۔byk wkt akdar۔an kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur is dayta ki nwayt par mnhasar hay js ki aap ko nmaindghy karnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: ghair mlky klyd aur chyk rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dono JSON (jawa askrpt aabjykt nwtyshn) aur XML (aykstynsybl mark ap zaban) dono ko sakhty aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy kay liye braay pymanay par dayta farmyts astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un main trkyb ، astamal aur khsawsayat kay lhaaza sy kuch aham akhtlafat hayn: nhaw: JSON jawa askrpt aabjykt sy mtasar ayk nhaw ka astamal krta haay۔asharay ، aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karty hoey klydy kdr kay jwraay aur srnywn ko baltrtyb ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany ({}) aur mrba brykt ([]) main mnslk karty hayn۔JSON is kay jama nhaw kay sath sadghy aur prahnay ki ahalyt par zawr dyta haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: JSONCOPY kwda {"nam": "jan" ، "amr": 30 ، "shhar": "nyw yark"} XML ، dusri taraf ، ayk mark ap zaban ka trkyb astamal krta hay js main zaawyha brykt (<>) main mnslk anasar hawtay hayn۔yha ghhrylw anasar aur safat ko sakht aur myta dayta ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔JSON kay mkablay main XML zayada fal hawta haay۔msaal: py aych py kwpy kwda <prsn> <name> jan </name> <agy> 30 </age> << sty> nyw yark </city> </person> dayta ki nmaindghy: JSON bnyady tawr par halkay wzan main sakhty aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔awr ansany prahnay kay kabl farmyt۔yha aam tawr par sstm ، knfyghryshn failwn ، aur APIs kay mabyn dayta antrchynj kay liye astamal hawta haay۔dwsry taraf ، JSON ki sadghy jawa askrpt par mbny ayply kyshnza daat ayks aym ayl main kam karna aasan bnaty hay ، dusri taraf ، ayk wrstail mark ap zaban hay jo pychydha drjha bndy kay dahanchay ki ajazat dyty hay aur azuafy myta dayta aur mkhlwta mwad kay sath aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye zayada lchk pysh krty haay۔XML aksar mkhtlf dawmynza main astamal hawta hay ، bshmwl wyb srwsza ، dstawyza astwryj ، knfyghryshn failyn ، aur mkhtlf plyt farmza kay mabyn dayta aykschynj۔ parsngh aur prwsysngh: JSON ko jawa askrpt aur bohat sy dyghr prwghramngh zabanwn main aabaiy mdd haasal hay ، js sy tjzayha aur aml main aasany hawty haay۔JSON dayta ko braha rast prwghramngh zabanwn main mwjwd ashyaa kay liye nkshha bnaya jaskta hay ، dayta ki hayra phyry ko aasan bnata hay aur ayply kyshn lajk daat ayks aym ayl kay sath anzumam ، jabky prwghramngh zabanwn aur laibryrywn kay zaryaha bhi achhy tarah sy taawn kya jata hay ، aksar aadad wa shmar ko mؤsar tarykay sy dayta nkalnay aur is par karrwaiy kay l additional azuafy tjzayha aur tbdyly kay akdamat ki zurwrt hawty haay۔XML dayta ko aam tawr par XML parsr aur XPath ya XSLT tyknalwjyza ka astamal karty hoey amldraamd kya jata haay۔ ryday ayblty aur wrbwsyty: JSON ko is kay jama trkyb ki wjha sy zayada kmpykt aur prahnay kay kabl smjha jata haay۔ansanwn kay liye braha rast smjhna aur kam karna aksar aasan hawta haay۔JSON ki sadghy bhi is ko nhaw ki ghltaywn ka shkar bnaty haay۔yha XML dstawyzaat ko zayada aur zayada pychydha bna sakta hay ، lekin is sy azuafy myta dayta aur mkhlwta mwad ki bhi ajazat mlty haay۔ khlasaha main ، JSON aur XML dono mkbwl aadad wa shmar ki shklyn hain ، lekin JSON aam tawr par jawa askrpt par mbny mahawl main is ki sadghy ، aasany kay astamal kay hak main haay۔، aur sakhty aadad wa shmar ki mwsar nmaindghy۔dwsry taraf ، XML zayada lchk pysh krta hay ، myta dayta kay liye mdd krta hay ، aur aam tawr par mtnwa dawmynza main astamal hawta hay jahan pychydha drjha bndy kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔JSON aur XML kay mabyn antkhab mkhsawsa tkazuwn ، mwjwdha nzaamwn ، aur mahawlyaty nzaam par mnhasar hay js main dayta par karrwaiy aur tbadlha kya jaye gha۔

Question: NULL aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟

Question: tkhlyk dayta bys aur darap dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl jesay dayta bys sstm kay tnazar main ، mymwry astwryj anjn aur anwda by astwryj anjn dayta astwryj ko snbhalnay kay liye do mkhtlf akhtyarat hain ، aur woh apni khsawsayat aur astamal kay maamlat kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn: mymwry astwryj anjn: nam sy jana jata haay۔hayp anjn ki haysayt sy ، dayta ko bnyady tawr par dask kay bjaiay mymwry main astwr krta haay۔as sy mymwry ki myzayn tkhlyk hawty hain jo sstm mymwry main mhafwza hawty hayn۔ mymwry anjn main zakhyrha shuda dayta atar chrahaؤ hawta hay aur jab dayta bys srwr dwbarha shrwa hawta hay ya krysh hawta hay tou woh khw jata haay۔yha bnyady tawr par aarzuy ya aarzuy aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay js ko brkrar rkhnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔ mymwry anjn ko tyza rftar dayta tak rsaiy kay liye jana jata hay kywnkha yeh mymwry main mkml tawr par kam krta haay۔yha un mnzarnamwn kay liye mwzawn hay jahan tyzay sy prahnay aur lkhnay kay kam aham hain ، jesay aksar rsaiy waly dayta kychngh ya aarzuy syshn kay aadad wa shmar ko astwr krna۔ mymwry anjn tranzaykshnza ، ghair mlky chabyan ، ya krysh ki bazayaby jesi khsawsayat ki hamayt nahin krta hay kywnkha yeh atar chrahaؤ par anhasaar krta haaydaytadyghr astwryj anjnwn kay mkablay main asharyha sazay kay akhtyarat mhadwd hayn۔ anwda by astwryj anjn: anwda by astwryj anjn ays kyw ayl main ayk mzubwta aur wsya pymanay par astamal shuda astwryj anjn hay ، jo aaly karkrdghy ، wshwsnyyta ، aur dayta ki salmyt kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ yeh dask par dayta astwr krta hay js ka mjmwaha astamal karty hoey kya jata haay۔mymwry bfrza aur dask par mbny failyn۔yha tyzaab (aytmyty ، mstkl mzaajy ، tnhaaiy ، asthakam) kay lyn dyn kay liye maawnt fraham krta hay ، aadad wa shmar main mstkl mzaajy aur asthakam ko ykyny bnana۔ ayn aw ayn aw day by ktaar ki staha par tala lghanay ، ksayr alshar hum aahanghy kntrwl (aym wy sy sy) ، aur ghair mlky klydy rkawtwn jesi khsawsayat pysh krta hay ، js sy yeh mnasb hawta haay۔aysy ayply kyshnza jn kay liye tranzaykshnl spwrt aur dayta ki salmyt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yeh krysh ki bazayaby kay tarykha kar fraham krta hay ، js sy dayta bys ko sstm ki nakamy ki sawrt main dayta mstkl mzaajy ki bhaaly aur brkrar rkhnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ INNODB mkhtlf asharyha sazay kay akhtyarat ki hamayt krta hay aur khwdkar dayda lak ka ptha lghanay ، khwdkar khlaiy antzaam ، aur khsawsayat fraham krta haay۔mlty ywzar mahawl main bhatr karkrdghy kay liye hum aahanghy kntrwl۔ khlasaha main ، mymwry aur anwda by astwryj anjnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk un kay dayta astwryj mykanzam ، dayta ki astkamt ، aur un ki pysh krdha khsawsayat main haay۔mymwry anjn aarzuy aur atar chrahaؤ kay aadad wa shmar kay liye mwzawn hay jo mkml tawr par mymwry main mhafwza hay ، tyza rftar tak rsaiy ki pysh ksh krta hay lekin asthakam ya aaly drjay ki khsawsayat kay bghyr۔dwsry taraf ، INNODB anjn dask par paiydar astwryj mhaya krta hay ، lyn dyn ki hamayt krta hay ، dayta ki salmyt ، krysh ki bazayaby fraham krta hay ، aur aadad wa shmar ki aaly astkamt ki zurwryat kay sath amwmy mkasad ki ayply kyshnza kay liye zayada mwzawn haay۔

Question: byk ap dayta bys aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟

Question: flsh mraaat aur flsh tyblza kay byan main kya frk haay؟

Question: ayk shw tyblza aur tybl byan ki wzuahat kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys tyblza kay tnazar main ، ayk aarzuy jdwl aur mstkl (ya bakaadha) tybl mkhtlf khsawsayat aur astamal kay sath do ksm ki myzayn hayn: aarzuy jdwl: ayk aarzuy jdwl ayk tybl hay jo dayta bys syshn kay andr aarzuy astwryj kay liye tkhlyk aur astamal hawta haay۔ya ayk mkhsawsa dairha kar ، jesay ayk mkhsawsa knkshn ya tranzaykshn ۔mry tyblza ko aam tawr par kesi mkhsawsa astfsar ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ، ya ayplykyshn syshn ki nfy kay doran antrmydayt ya aarzuy dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔knkshn js nay inhain pyda kya۔dwsray dayta bys syshn ya rabtaay un jdwlwn tak rsaiy ya un main hayra phyry nahin krsktay hayn۔wha syshn ki amr sy aaghay nahin brahtay hayn۔ permenent (ya bakaadha) tybl: ayk mstkl tybl ، jsay bakaadha ya mstkl tybl bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk tybl hay jo tawyl mdty astamal kay liye dayta bys main tkhlyk aur mhafwza ki jati haay۔dayta ko hawlda karain js ko mtadd syshnwn ، rabtawn ، ya lyn dyn main brkrar rkhnay ki zurwrt haay۔ aam aadad wa shmar ko aam tawr par bnyady aadad wa shmar ، jesay saarf ki malwmat ، msanwa ka dayta ، ya lyn dyn kay rykardawn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yhaan tak keh jab dayta bys syshn ya knkshn js nay un ko tshkyl diya ho isy band ya khtm krdya jaiay۔wha dayta bys main rhatay hain jab tak keh wazuha tawr par ghra ya hazaf nah kryn۔ khlasaha main ، aarzuy jdwl aur mstkl jdwl kay darmiyan bnyady frk un ki amr aur mriyt main haay۔aarzuy jdwlyn kesi mkhsawsa syshn ya knkshn kay andr aarzuy astwryj kay liye bnaiy jati hain aur astamal hawty hain aur is syshn kay akhttam par khud bkhwd ghra di jati hayn۔dwsry taraf ، mstkl jdwlyn tawyl mdty astamal kay l the dayta bys main tkhlyk aur zakhyrha ki jati hain aur kesi khasa syshn ya rabtaay ki zandghy sy aaghay brkrar rhaty hayn۔

Question: shw kay dayta bys aur astamal kay dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys main aarzuy jdwlwn kay tnazar main ، aarzuy jdwlwn ki do aksam hayn: aalmy aarzuy myzayn aur mkamy aarzuy jdwlyn۔yha aksam un kay dairha kar aur rsai kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn: aalmy aarzuy jdwl: ayk aalmy aarzuy jdwl ayk aarzuy jdwl hay jo dayta bys kay andr mwjwd tamam syshnwn ya rabtawn kay liye kabl rsaiy haay۔ jab aalmy staha par aarzuy jdwl tyar kya jata hay tou ، is tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty hay aur is main hayra phyry ki jaskty haay۔dayta bys kay andr koi syshn ya knkshn ، ktaa nzar is sy ktaa nzar keh kis syshn nay isy tkhlyk kya haay۔ aalmy staha par aarzuy jdwl main mwjwd dayta mkhtlf syshnwn ya rabtawn kay darmiyan mshtrkha haay۔ayk sy zayada syshn byk wkt tybl main rykarda dakhl ، ap dayt ya hazaf krsktay hayn۔ ghlwbl aarzuy jdwlwn ko aam tawr par astamal kya jata hay jab aarzuy aadad wa shmar ko mtadd syshnwn ya rabtawn main shyir karnay aur un tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jesay ksayr saarf kay mahawl main ya aarzuy aadad wa shmar par taawn karty wkt۔mkamy aarzuy jdwl: ayk mkamy aarzuy jdwl ayk aarzuy jdwl hay jo syshn ya knkshn kay liye mkhsawsa hay jo isy tkhlyk krta haay۔ jab mkamy aarzuy tybl tyar kya jata hay tou ، is ko sirf syshn ya knkshn kay zaryaha rsaiy aur hayra phyry ki jaskty hay js nay isy tkhlyk kya haay۔dwsray syshnza ya rabtaay is tak rsaiy ya is main trmym nahin krsktay hayn۔ mkamy aarzuy tybl main mwjwd dayta njy hay aur is ko tkhlyk karnay waly syshn main alag thlgh haay۔har syshn main tybl aur is kay dayta ki apni kapy hawty haay۔ lwkl aarzuy jdwlyn aam tawr par is wkt astamal ki jati hain jab aarzuy dayta ko njy hony ki zurwrt hawty hay aur syshnwn main is ka ashtrak nahin hawta haay۔wha aam tawr par ayk mkhsawsa syshn ya pychydha swalat ya hasab ktab kay doran antrmydayt ya aarzuy ntaij ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، aalmy aarzuy jdwl aur mkamy aarzuy jdwl kay darmiyan bnyady frk un kay dairha kar aur rsai main haay۔aalmy aarzuy jdwlyn dayta bys kay andr mwjwd tamam syshnwn ya rabtawn kay liye kabl rsaiy hain aur mtadd syshnwn main dayta shyirngh ki ajazat dyty hayn۔mkamy aarzuy jdwlyn syshn ya knkshn kay liye mkhsawsa hain jo inhain tkhlyk krty hain aur njy aur alag thlgh dayta astwryj fraham krty hayn۔an kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay aur chahaay aap ko syshnwn main mshtrkha aadad wa shmar ko shyir karnay ya njy rkhnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: shw ghrant aur shw mtghyr kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، tyblt tybl aur darap tybl kay byanat ko dayta bys sy tyblza ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh apnay tarza aml aur un kay dayta aur tybl dahanchay par jab tak aap kay pas dayta bys ka byk ap nahin hawta hay is wkt tak tybl aur is kay dayta ko bazayaft nahin kya jaskta haay۔tybl tybl tybl kay dahanchay ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey tybl sy tamam ktaaryn hatata hay ، jabky darap tybl tybl ko mkml tawr par hatata hay ، js main is ki sakht ، asharyha jat aur dayta shaml hayn۔an kay darmiyan antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hay keh aya aap is ki sakht (trnkyt tybl) ko brkrar rkhtay hoey kesi tybl ko khaly karna chahti hain ya tybl aur is kay dayta (darap tybl) ko mstkl tawr par hazaf karna chahti hayn۔

akdar ko bazayaft karna chahti hain tou alag alag mtalwbha alfaza mfyd haay۔ khlasaha ، ahamshk kay zaryaha ghrwp kay darmiyan frk aur alag mtalwbha alfaza un ki faalyt aur astamal main haay۔ghrwp baiy shk ka astamal ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par ktaarwn ko ghrwp bndy karnay aur hr ghrwp par hasab ktab karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay ntyjay main ayk khlasaha aaؤt pt hawta haay۔dwsry taraf ، alag alag mtalwbha alfaza ka astamal ntaij kay syt sy nkl ktaarwn ko khtm karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh sirf anwkhy ktaaryn waps krdy gain ، baghair kesi hasab ktab ya ghrwp bndy kay۔an kay darmiyan antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hay keh aya aap ko ktaarwn kay ghrwpwn (ghrwp kay zaryaha) kay ghrwpwn par hasab ktab karnay ki zurwrt hay ya mkhsawsa kalmwn (algh algh) sy mnfrd akdar ko bazayaft karna hawgha۔

Question: msanwaat kay tybl sy tamam msanwaat ko mntkhb karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، ayk andrwny shmwlyt aur baien bazaw main shaml hony wali do ksmyn shaml hain jo ayk sy zayada jdwlwn sy dayta ko ykja karnay kay liye astamal hawty hain ، lekin woh is main mkhtlf hain keh woh jwain tyblza kay mabyn bay msaal ktaaryn kis tarah snbhaltay hayn: andrwny shmwldwnwn jdwlwn main mmasal akdar mkhsawsa jwain ki haalt ki bnyad par shaml hawiyn۔ jab aap andrwny shmwlyt ko anjam dytay hain tou ، ntyjha syt main sirf ktaaryn shaml hawty hain jahan shmwlyt ki haalt mtamin hawty haay۔ksy bhi jdwl ki ktaaryn jn kay pas dusray tybl main mmasal saf nahin hay is kay ntyjay sy kharj nahin hawta haay۔ andrwny jwain aapryshn mؤsar tarykay sy shmwlyt ki haalt par mbny do jdwlwn ka chwrahaa tlash krta haay۔ un main shaml hona aam tawr par is wkt astamal hawta hay jab aap sirf bazayaft karna chahti haynwha ktaaryn jo dono jdwlwn main mmasal akdar rkhty hain aur bay msaal ktaaryn kharj krty hayn۔. jab aap baien bazaw ko anjam dytay hain tou ، ntyjha syt main baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn shaml hawty hain ، ktaa nzar is sy keh un ki dien tybl main ktaaryn mmasal hayn۔aghr baien tybl sy kesi ktaar main dien tybl main mmasal saf nahin hay tou ، dien jdwl kay kalmwn kay liye kaladm akdar waps krdyiay jatay hayn۔ baien shmwlyt ka aapryshn is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn ntaij kay syt main shaml hon ، yahan tak khaaghr dien tybl main koi mych nahin haay۔ aam tawr par jab aap baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn bazayaft karna chahti hain tou aam tawr par shaml hawta hay ، is kay sath sath dien tybl sy kesi bhi mmasal ktaarwn kay sath۔as sy aap ko baien tybl sy bay msaal ktaaryn shaml karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔andrwny shmwlyt sirf dono jdwlwn main mmasal akdar kay sath ktaaryn lwtty hay ، js main bay msaal ktaarwn ko chhwra kr۔baiyn bazaw ki shmwlyt baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn aur dien tybl sy mmasal ktaaryn lwtaty hay ، js main dien tybl kay kalmwn kay liye kaladm akdar kay sath bay msaal ktaaryn shaml hayn۔an kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar is bat par hay keh aya aap bay msaal ktaaryn (andrwny shmwlyt) ko kharj karna chahti hain ya ntaij kay syt main bay msaal ktaar (baiyn shmwlyt) shaml karna chahti hayn۔

Question: un tamam msanwaat ko mntkhb karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn jn ki kymt 50.00 sy zayada haay۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، ayk "byrwny shmwlyt" ayk aam asatalaha hay js main dono "baiyn byrwny shmwlyt" aur "daiyn byrwny shmwlyt" shaml hain ، jo byrwny shaml hony ki mkhsawsa ksm hayn۔aaiyay byrwny shmwlyt aur dien jwain kay mabyn akhtlafat par tbadlha khyal kryn: byrwny shmwlyt: ayk byrwny shmwlyt ayk tybl sy tamam ktaaryn lwtata hay aur jwain ki haalt ki bnyad par dusray tybl (zabanyn) sy mlap ki ktaaryn۔as main kesi bhi jdwl sy bay msaal ktaaryn shaml hain ، agar koi hay tou ، ntyjha syt myn۔ byrwny shmwlyt ka aapryshn is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ayk tybl sy bay msaal ktaaryn ab bhi dusray tybl kay kalmwn kay liye kaladm akdar ko tbdyl krkay taay shuda ntaij main shaml hayn۔ byrwny shmwlyt kar saktay hayn۔mzayd tyn aksam main drjha bndy ki jaiay: baien byrwny shmwlyt ، dien byrwny shmwlyt ، aur mkml byrwny shmwlyt۔ rait jwain (daiyn byrwny shmwlyt): ayk dien shmwlyt ، jsay dien byrwny shmwlyt kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، dien tybl aur mmasal sy tamam ktaaryn lwtata haay۔jwain ki haalt ki bnyad par baien tybl sy ktaaryn۔as main dien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn shaml hain ، yahan tak keh agar baien jdwl main koi mmasal ktaaryn nahin hayn۔ dien jwain main ، baien tybl sy bay msaal ktaarwn main baien tybl kay kalmwn kay liye kaladm akdar hon ghay۔jwain aapryshn is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh dien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn ntaij kay syt main shaml ki gain ، yahan tak keh agar baien tybl main koi mych nahin haay۔ khlasaha main ، byrwny shmwlyt aur dien shmwlyt kay darmiyan bnyady frk un ki amwmy nwayt main haay۔byrwny shmwlyt ayk wsya tr asatalaha hay js main mkhtlf aksam kay byrwny mlanay par mushtamil hay ، js main baien byrwny shmwlyt ، dien byrwny shmwlyt ، aur mkml byrwny shmwlyt shaml haay۔daiyn jwain ، khasa tawr par dien byrwny shmwlyt ، byrwny shmwlyt ki ayk ksm hay jo dien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn aur baien tybl sy mlap wali ktaaryn lwtaty hay ، js main dien tybl sy bay msaal ktaaryn shaml hain js main baien tybl kay kalmwn kay liye kaladm akdar hayn۔

Question: "an tamam msanwaat ko mntkhb karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn jn ka nam harf" "ty" "say shrwa hawta haay۔"
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، ywnyn aur ywnyn dono tamam byanat ko ayk sy zayada mntkhb swalat kay ntaij kay syt ko ayk hi ntyjha syt main jwranay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh is main mkhtlf hain keh woh daplykyt ktaar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn: ywnyn: ywnyn ka byan ntaij kay ntaij ko ykja karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk hi ntyjha syt main do ya do sy zayada mntkhb swalatntyjha main sirf anwkhy ktaaryn shaml ki ghiyn۔ ywnyn aapryshn mshtrkha ntaij kay sytwn par ayk alag aapryshn anjam dyta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh daplykyt ktaaryn khtm hawjaiyn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh mntkhb krdha swalat main kalm kay nam aur mtalkha kalmwn kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam lazmi hayn۔ayk kamyab ywnyn ka mkablha kryn۔yha anfrady swalat kay ntaij kay sytwn ko aasany sy jwrata hay ، bshmwl hr astfsar ki tamam ktaaryn ، ktaa nzar is sy ktaa nzar۔yha ywnyn sy tyza tr hay kywnkha is main daplykyt ktaarwn ko khtm karnay ka awwr hayda nahin haay۔ ywnyn sab kay sath ، mntkhb krdha swalat main kalm kay namwn aur dayta ki aksam kay liye zurwry nahin haay۔ywnyn aur ywnyn tamam jhwt bwltay hain keh woh daplykyt ktaar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn۔ywnyn hatmy ntaij kay syt sy khud bkhwd daplykyt ktaaryn hatata hay ، jabky ywnyn main tamam anfrady swalat sy tamam ktaaryn shaml hain ، jn main nkwl bhi shaml hayn۔aghr aap nkl ko khtm karna chahti hain aur sirf anwkhy ktaaryn shaml karna chahti hain tou ، aap ywnyn astamal krsktay hayn۔aghr aap daplykyt ko hataiay aur karkrdghy ko trjyha dyiay baghair ntaij kay syt ko aktha karna chahti hain tou ، aap ywnyn sab ko astamal krsktay hayn۔

Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، dono aardar kay zaryaha aur had kay byanat ko astfsar kay ntaij kay syt par kabw panay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: aardar bzaryaha: byan kay zaryaha aardar ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par astfsar kay ntaij ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔chrahaiy ya nzawl trtyb myn۔ jab aap aardar ka astamal karty hain tou ، aap kalm (zabanyn) ki wzuahat karty hain js kay zaryaha aap trtyb dena chahti hain aur chhantnay ka hakm (chrahnay ya atrtay hayn)۔ shk kay zaryaha aardar aam tawr par astfsar kay aakhr main astamal hawta hay aur is par laghw hawta haaypwra ntyjha syt۔ yeh mkhsawsa mayar par mbny ktaar ko trtyb denay kay liye mntkhb byan kay zaryaha aardar ka astamal karna aam haay۔zayadha sy zayada ktaarwn ko waps karna haay۔ had ki shk aam tawr par kesi swal kay aakhr main astamal ki jati hay ، agar shk kay zaryaha aardar kay bad agar mwjwd ho tw۔ yeh aap ko ntyjha syt kay aaghaza sy hi ayk mkhsawsa tadad main ktaarwn ko bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ya is ko chhwra dyta haay۔ktaarwn ki kuch tadad aur ktaarwn ki ayk had ko bazayaft krna۔ had kay liye nhaw mkhtlf dayta bys sstm kay mabyn thwraa sa mkhtlf hawta hay ، lekin aam tsawr ayk hi rhata haay۔ khlasaha main ، byanat kay zaryaha aardar aur had kay darmiyan bnyady frk un ka mksad aur asar haayntyjha sytaardar bazaria mkhsawsa mayar ki bnyad par ntaij syt ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky had ka astamal ntaij kay syt sy waps aanay wali ktaarwn ki tadad ko mhadwd karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔aardar bazaria ktaarwn kay trtyb ko mtasar krta hay ، jabky had ntaij kay syt main shaml hony wali ktaarwn ki tadad ka tayn krty haay۔

Question: tamam msanwaat ki awsta kymt tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: INT aur dayt taim dayta ki aksam ko SQL main mkhtlf ksm kay dayta ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay: INT: INT dayta ki ksm addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jo aasharyha mkamat kay baghair pori tadad hayn۔ yeh aam tawr par ayk addy mkdar ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jesay ghnty ،ayk shnakht knndha ، ya ryazuy kay hasab ktab main astamal hony wali ayk kymt۔ INT kdr ka saiza mkhsawsa dayta bys sstm par mnhasar hawta hay aur mkhtlf nzaamwn kay mabyn mkhtlf hawskta hay ، lekin yeh aam tawr par -2،147،483،648 sy 2،147،483،647 (32 -bt dstkhta shuda add sy mkhtlf akdar ki ajazat dyta haay۔) .k dayta ki ksm tarykhwn ya awkat kay baray main koi malwmat mhafwza nahin krty haay۔ dayt taim: dayt taim dayta ki ksm ays kyw ayl main tarykh aur wkt ki kdrwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ yeh wkt main ayk khasa nktaha ki nmaindghy krta hay ، bshmwl tarykh aur wkt dono ajzaaa۔ dayta taim۔dayta taip sal ، mhaynha ، dn ، ghhntha ، mnt ، aur dusra kay baray main malwmat ko zakhyrha krta haay۔ dayt taim wylyw ka saiza aur tarykhwn aur awkat ki had js ki nmaindghy mkhsawsa dayta bys sstm par hawty hay ، lekin yeh aam tawr par wsya rynj ki ajazat dyta haay۔kiy salwn main phyly hui akdar ky۔ dayta taim dayta ki ksm ki shkl aur sahat sy mtalk dayta bys sstm kay lhaaza sy bhi mkhtlf hawskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، INT aur dayt taim kay darmiyan bnyady frk woh aadad wa shmar ki ksm hay js ki woh nmaindghy karty hayn۔INT antyjr akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky tarykh aur wkt ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayt taim astamal hawta haay۔INT addy mkdar ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jabky dayt taim wkt main mkhsawsa nkat ki nmaindghy krta haay۔

Question: tamam msanwaat ki sab sy zayada kymt tlash karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، mtn aur blab dayta ki aksam ka astamal baltrtyb bray mkdar main mtn ya bainry dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: mtn: tykst dayta ki ksm mtn kay aadad wa shmar ki bray mkdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jesay mtn kay pyraghraf ، mzuamyn ، ya malwmat kay dusray lmbay tkraay۔ yeh zayada sy zayada had kay sath mtghyr lmbaiy kay tar ko rakh sakta haay۔، jo dayta bys sstm par mnhasar hawta haay۔ tykst dayta ki ksm aam tawr par kryktr dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay aur krdar kay syt aur kwlyshnza ki ayk wsya rynj ki hamayt krty haay۔ tykst kalmwn ko andayks aur mwsar tarykay sy tlash kya jaskta haay۔tykst dayta ki aksam ki mkhtlf haaltwn ، jesay wrchar ، langh tykst ، ya sy ayl aw by ، hr ayk main mkhtlf astwryj ki salahaytwn aur lmbaiy ki hadwd hayn۔ blwb: blab (bainry bray shay) dayta ki ksm bray mkdar main bainry dayta ko astwr karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jesay tsaawyr ، aadayw ، aadaywfailyn ، wydayw failyn ، ya bainry dayta ki koi dusri ksm۔ is main zayada sy zayada had kay sath mtghyr lmbaiy bainry dayta ko tham sakta hay ، jo dayta bys sstm par mnhasar hawta haay۔ blab dayta ki ksm aam tawr par ghair mtnwa dayta ko astwr karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jysaykham bainry failwn kw۔dayta ki aksam woh dayta ki ksm hay jo woh astwr karty hayn۔mtn ko bray mkdar main mtny aadad wa shmar kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky blab bray mkdar main bainry dayta kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mtn ka mksad krdar kay aadad wa shmar kay liye hay aur woh krdar kay sytwn aur kwlyshnwn ki hamayt krta hay ، jabky blab ghair tykstykl bainry dayta kay liye haay۔

Question: tamam msanwaat ki sab sy kam kymt tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، flwt aur dabl dayta dono aksam ka astamal flwtngh pwaint nmbr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔taham ، un kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat mwjwd hayn: flwt: flwt dayta ki ksm snghl prysyzayshn kay sath mtwka addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔mkhsawsa dayta bys sstm ، lekin yeh aam tawr par sahat sy mtalk ayk khasa staha kay sath akdar ki ayk wsya rynj ki ajazat dyta haay۔ flwt wylyw ki sahat sy mtalk aam tawr par 7 aasharyha kay ard ghrd hawty haay۔.yha astwryj ki jghha kay 8 baits par kbzuha krta haay۔ kdrwn ki had jo dabl kalm main mhafwza ki jaskty hay aam tawr par flwt ki nsbt bray hawty haay۔ dabl wylyw ki sahat sy mtalk aam tawr par 15 aasharyha 15 aasharyha kay ard ghrd hawty hay ، js sy yeh flwt sy zayada ayn mtaabk hawta haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، flwt aur dabl kay mabyn aham akhtlafat astwryj ka saiza aur sahat sy mtalk hayn۔flwt ayk wahad sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint ksm hay js main 4 baits astwryj aur kryb 7 aasharyha sahat sy mtalk mkamat hayn۔dabl ayk dabl sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint ksm hay js main 8 baits astwryj aur tkryba 15 15 aasharyha sahat sy mtalk mkamat hayn۔aghr aaly sahat sy mtalk ki zurwrt ho tou ، aam tawr par dabl ko trjyha di jati hay ، lekin is main astwryj ki zayada jghha bhi astamal hawty haay۔flwt aur dabl kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye drkar sahat sy mtalk staha par mnhasar haay۔

Question: msanwaat kay tybl main msanwaat ki tadad tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، aasharyha aur addy aadad wa shmar ki aksam ka astamal ayk mkhsawsa sahat sy mtalk aur pymanay kay sath fksda pwaint aasharyha aasharyha aadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔zayadha tr dayta bys sstm main ، yeh dono dayta aksam mtradf hain aur tbadlha khyal kay sath astamal ki jaskty hayn۔taham ، kuch dayta bys sstm un ko alag alag dayta ki aksam kay tawr par slwk krsktay hain ، agarcha isi tarah ki khsawsayat kay bawjwd۔yhaan aham nkat hayn: aasharyha aur addy: dono aasharyha aur addy dono fksda pwaint pwaint aasharyha aadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔) zakhyrha shuda akdar ky۔ yeh aadad wa shmar ki aksam ayn mtaabk aasharyha akdar ، jesay maly ya malyaty aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mwzawn hain ، jahan sahat sy mtalk aham haay۔ aasharyha/addy akdar ki sahat sy mtalk aur pymanay par zayada sy zayada tadad ka tayn kya jaskta hay jo zakhyrha kya jaskta hay ، dono ko zakhyrha kya jaskta haay۔aasharyha/addy akdar ka asal astwryj saiza sahat sy mtalk aur pymanay ki bnyad par mkhtlf hawta haay۔dayta ki aksam aam tawr par ays kyw ayl main tbadlha tawr par astamal hawty hayn۔wha ayk mkhsawsa sahat sy mtalk aur pymanay kay sath aasharyha aasharyha kay ayn mtaabk zakhyrha karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔aasharyha aur addy kay darmiyan antkhab aksar mkhsawsa dayta bys sstm kay sath trjyha ya mtaabkt ka maamlha hawta haay۔

Question: pchhlay 30 dnwn main tyar krdha msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، char aur wrchr dono ko kryktr strngh dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat mwjwd hayn: char: char dayta taip fksda lmbaiy kay krdar kay tarwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ jab aap char kalm ki wzuahat karty hain tou ، aap zayada sy zayada wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay haaml harfwn ki tadad ، aur yeh hamyshha is jghha ki mkdar par kbzuha kray gi ، ktaa nzar is sy ktaa nzar keh zakhyrha shuda kymt ki asal lmbaiy۔char wylyw ki bazayaft hamyshha mkhsawsa lmbaiy ko waps krday gi ، bshmwl trylngh khaly jghhawn smyt۔ wrchar: wrchr: wrchar dayta ki ksm mtghyr lmbaiy kay krdar kay tarwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ jab aap wrchar kalm ki wzuahat karty hain tou ، aap zayada sy zayada harfwn ki wzuahat karty hain js main is ki zayada sy zayada tadad mwjwd haay۔، lekin yeh sirf kymt ki asal lmbaiy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astwryj ki zurwry mkdar ka astamal kray gha۔ wrchar kalm kay liye astwryj ki jghha mthark hay aur is ka anhasaar zakhyrha shuda kymt ki lmbaiy par haay۔zakhyrha shuda kymt ، baghair kesi trylngh khaly jghhawn kay۔ khlasaha main ، char aur wrchar kay darmiyan bnyady frk woh hay js tarah sy woh kryktr strngh dayta ko astwr karty hayn۔char astwrza fksda lmbaiy kay tarwn aur hamyshha mkhsawsa lmbaiy par kbzuha karty hain ، jabky wrchr mtghyr lmbaiy kay tarwn ko astwr krta hay aur sirf kdr ki asal lmbaiy ki bnyad par zurwry astwryj ka astamal krta haay۔char aur wrchar kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar aadad wa shmar ki zakhyrha karnay ki nwayt aur mtalwbha astwryj slwk par haay۔aghr akdar ki lmbaiy mstkl hay tou ، char zayada mnasb hawskta haay۔aghr lmbaiy nmayan tawr par mkhtlf hawty hay tou ، astwryj ki jghha kay lhaaza sy aam tawr par wrchr zayada mwsar hawta haay۔

Question: pchhlay 30 dnwn main ap dayt hony wali msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، kalm ya kalmwn kay syt main anfradyt ko nafza karnay kay liye bnyady klyd aur mnfrd klyd dono ka astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat mwjwd hayn: bnyady klyd: ayk bnyady klyd ayk kalm ya kalmwn ka ayk syt hay jo hr saf main anfrady tawr par shnakht krta haay۔ayk tybl۔ yahan sirf ayk bnyady klyd ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔ ayk bnyady klydy kalm (zabanyn) main akdar ko anwkha hona chahaiay aur is main kaladm akdar par mushtamil nahin hawskta haay۔ bnyady klydy rkawt khud bkhwd kalm (zabanyn) par ayk anwkha andayks bnaty hay js ko nafza karnay kay liayanfradyt aur tlash ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaiyn۔ aam tawr par ، bnyady klyd ko ghair mlky klydy talkat kay zaryaha dusray jdwlwn kay hawalha kay tawr par astamal kya jata haay۔ anwyk klyd: ayk anwkhy klyd kalm ya kalmwn ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo kalm (zabanyn) kay andr akdar ki anfradyt ko ykyny bnata haay۔.mlypl anwkhy klydy rkawtwn ki wzuahat kesi tybl main ki jaskty hay ، js sy mtadd kalmwn ya kalmwn kay sytwn ko anwkhy akdar ki ajazat di jaskty haay۔ ayk mnfrd klydy kalm (zabanyn) main akdar ko mnfrd hona chahaiay ، lekin ayk bnyady klyd kay braks ، kaladm akdar ki ajazat hay (sathayk jama mnfrd klyd main shaml kalmwn ki raayt jahan NULL ko sirf ayk bar ajazat di jati haay). anwkhy klydy rkawt anfradyt ko nafza karnay aur tlash ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kalm (zabanyn) par ayk anwkha andayks bhi tshkyl dyty haay۔ ayk bnyady klyd ki tarah ، ayk anwkhy klyd krta haay۔jdwl kay liye bnyady shnakht knndha kay tawr par kam nah karain aur talkat kay lhaaza sy kesi khasa ahamyt ka mtalb nhayn۔ khlasaha main ، bnyady klyd aur anwkhy klyd dono kalm ya kalmwn kay syt main anfradyt ko ykyny bnatay hayn۔taham ، ayk bnyady klyd ayk tybl main hr saf ki anfrady tawr par shnakht krty hay ، anfradyt aur ghair nwl hay ، aur is tybl kay liye bnyady shnakht knndha kay tawr par kam krty haay۔dwsry taraf ، ayk anwkhy klyd anfradyt ko nafza krty hay lekin kaladm akdar ki ajazat dyty hay aur mtadd kalmwn par is ki taryf ki jaskty haay۔

Question: prwdakt_kytryjry_ aai day kalm par zamrha jat tybl kay sath prwdakt tybl main shaml hony kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، ghair mlky klyd aur chyk ki rkawtyn aadad wa shmar ki salmyt kay kwaad ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: ghair mlky klydy rkawt: ayk ghair mlky klydy rkawt ka astamal ayk rshtha dar dayta bys main do jdwlwn kay mabyn ryfrntl salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ayk tybl main kalm ya kalm (ghyr mlky klyd) ka syt aur kesi dusray tybl main bnyady klyd ya ayk anwkhy klyd (hawalha ki klyd)۔ ghair mlky klydy rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh ghair mlky klydy kalm (zabanyn) main akdar sy mltay hayn۔hawalha shuda klydy kalm (zabanyn) main ya kaladm hain (aghr ghair mlky klydy kalm kaladm akdar ki ajazat dyta haay) ۔yha talkat ki khlaf wrzay karnay waly akdamat ko rwknay kay zaryaha aadad wa shmar ki salmyt aur mstkl mzaajy ko brkrar rkhnay main mdd krta hay ، jesay ghair mlky klyd main kdr dakhl krna۔kalm jo hawalha denay waly klydy kalm main mwjwd nahin haay۔ chyk rkawt: ayk aysy haalt ki wzuahat krkay dawmyn ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk chyk rkawt ka astamal kya jata hay jo tybl main hr saf kay liye sch hona chahaiay۔ yeh aap ko bwlyn azahaar ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo schaiy ka andazaha krta haay۔ya ghalat ، aur is haalt ko jdwl main hr saf kay liye janch pratal ki jati haay۔ chyk rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh mkhsawsa kalm (zabanyn) main mwjwd dayta mkhsawsa haalt ko pora krta haay۔ is ko ajazat di hogi akdar ki had ko mhadwd karnay ، dayta farmytngh kay kwaad ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔، ya karwbary kwaad ko aadad wa shmar par laghw kryn۔ chyk rkawt main byan ki hogi haalt ayk sadha mwazanha ya ayk pychydha azahaar hawskty hay js main mtadd kalm shaml hayn۔ khlasaha main ، jdwlwn kay mabyn ryfrntl salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk ghair mlky klydy rkawt ka astamal kya jata hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ayk main akdarghyr mlky klydy kalm (zabanyn) akdar ko ayk hawalha shuda klydy kalm (zabanyn) main ya kaladm hayn۔dwsry taraf ، ayk chyk rkawt ka astamal dawmyn ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jata hay js ki twsayk krkay keh ayk mkhsawsa haalt ayk myza main hr saf kay liye drst haay۔yha aap ko kesi ayk tybl kay andr mwjwd dayta par kstm haalat ya kwaad ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: "" "lbas" "zamrha main mwjwd msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔"
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، kalm ki akdar kay kwaad ki wzuahat kay liye kaladm aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawtwn ka astamal nahin kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: kaladm nahin rkawtyn is bat ko ykyny bnaty hain keh kalm main koi nyly akdar nahin hon ghy۔ jab kalm kay sath byan kya jata haay۔kaladm rkawt nahin ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh is kalm main tybl ki hr saf ki ghair nwl kymt honi chahaiay۔ yeh kesi kdr ki mwjwdghy ki zurwrt kay zaryaha dayta ki salmyt ko nafza krta hay ، aur jab aadad wa shmar main adm mtaabkt ya ghltaywn ko rwknay main mdd mlty hay jab kaladm akdar ki ajazat nahin hawty haay۔ayk mkhsawsa kalm۔ agar kesi kalm main kesi kalm main kesi kalm main kal nah hony wali rkawt kay sath dakhl karnay ki kwshsh ki jati hay tou ، dayta bys ayk ghltay main azuafha kray ga ، aur andraj nakam hawjaiay gha۔ dayfalt rkawt: pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ko pehlay sy taay shuda kymt ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk kalm jab kesi dakhl hony waly aapryshn kay doran koi wazuha kdr fraham nahin ki jati haay۔ jab kesi kalm ki wzuahat pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay sath ki jati hay ، agar kesi dakhl hony waly byan kay doran is kalm kay liye wazuha tawr par koi kdr fraham nahin ki jati hay tou ، rkawt main mtayn pehlay sy taay shuda kymt astamal ki jaye ghy۔ is ki ajazat hawghy۔aap kesi pehlay sy taay shuda kymt ki wzuahat karain ga jo khud bkhwd kalm ko tfwyzu krdy jati hay agar koi dusri kymt fraham nahin ki jati haay۔ pehlay sy taay shuda kymt mstkl kymt ، azahaar ya sstm sy taay shuda fnkshn hawskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، kaladm rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh ayk kalm is bat ko ykyny bnata haay۔NULL akdar ki ajazat nahin dyta hay ، jabky pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kesi pehlay sy taay shuda kymt ki wzuahat krty hay jo astamal ki jati hay jab koi wazuha kymt fraham nahin ki jati haay۔NULL kesi kdr ki mwjwdghy ko nafza nahin krta hay ، jabky dayfalt dayfalt wylyw fraham krta hay jab koi kymt wazuha tawr par nahin di jati haay۔

Question: "" "jwtay" "zamray main mwjwd msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn aur is ki kymt 50.00 sy zayada haay۔"

،awr mtadd ktaarwn main kalmwn main anfradyt ki zurwrt ki khlaf wrzay kay baghair mnfrd rkawtwn kay sath kalmwn main kaladm akdar hawsktay hayn۔ mnfrd rkawt anfradyt ko nafza karnay aur tlash ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kalm (zabanyn) par ayk anwkha andayks tshkyl dyty haay۔ bnyady klydy rkawt: ayk haay۔khsawsay ksm ki anwkhy rkawt jo hr saf ko ayk tybl main mnfrd tawr par shnakht krty haay۔ yeh kesi tybl kay liye bnyady shnakht knndha ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aam tawr par kesi ayk kalm ya kalmwn kay syt ko bnyady klyd kay tawr par byan krkay۔ sirf ayk bnyady klyd ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔fy jdwl۔ praimry klydy kalm (zabanyn) main akdar ko mnfrd hona chahaiay aur is main kaladm akdar par mushtamil nahin hawskta haay۔ bnyady klydy rkawt khud bkhwd kalm (zabanyn) par ayk anwkha andayks tshkyl dyty hay takha anfradyt ko nafza kya jaskay aur tlash ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔ bnyady klyd aksar hawty haay۔ghyr mlky klydy talkat kay zaryaha NULL akdar kay mtadd wakaat ki ajazat dyty hay aur is ki wzuahat mtadd kalmwn par ki jaskty hay ، jabky ayk bnyady klydy rkawt ayk myza main hr ktaar ki anfrady tawr par shnakht krty hay ، kaladm akdar ki ajazat nahin dyty hay ، aur aam tawr par jdwl kay liye bnyady shnakht knndha kay tawr par astamal hawty haay۔

Question: "kymt kay lhaaza sy msanwaat ko aardar karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔"

is main sadha mwazanha ya pychydha azahaar shaml hawsktay hayn۔ayk tybl main kalm ya kalm (ghyr mlky klyd) kay syt kay darmiyan aur kesi aur tybl main bnyady klyd ya ayk mnfrd klyd (hawalha denay wali klyd)hawalha shuda klydy kalm (zabanyn) main akdar ya kaladm hain (aghr ghair mlky klydy kalm kaladm akdar ki ajazat dyta haay) ۔yha talkat ki khlaf wrzay karnay waly akdamat ko rwknay kay zaryaha aadad wa shmar ki salmyt aur mstkl mzaajy ko brkrar rkhnay main mdd krta hay ، jesay ghair mlky main kdr dakhl krna۔klydy kalm jo hawalha shuda klydy kalm main mwjwd nahin haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ayk aysy haalt ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ayk chyk rkawt ka astamal kya jata hay jo ayk myza main hr ktaar kay liye drst hona chahaiay ، jabky myzawn kay mabyn ryfrntl salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk ghair mlky klydy rkawt ka astamal kya jata haay۔chyk ki rkawt kalm ki staha par lghaiy jati hay aur kesi mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par kalm main ajazat di hogi akdar ko mhadwd krty haay۔dwsry taraf ، ghair mlky klydy rkawt myzawn kay mabyn ayk rshtha kaim krty hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh ghair mlky klydy kalm (zabanyn) main akdar hawalha shuda klydy kalm (zabanyn) main mwjwd akdar sy mltay hain ya kaladm hayn۔

Question: frwry kay mhaynay main sab sy zayada mshhawr msanwaat tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، kalm ki akdar kay kwaad ki wzuahat kay liye kaladm aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawtwn ka astamal nahin kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: kaladm nahin rkawtyn is bat ko ykyny bnaty hain keh kalm main koi nyly akdar nahin hon ghy۔ jab kalm kay sath byan kya jata haay۔kaladm rkawt nahin ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh is kalm main tybl ki hr saf ki ghair nwl kymt honi chahaiay۔ yeh kesi kdr ki mwjwdghy ki zurwrt kay zaryaha dayta ki salmyt ko nafza krta hay ، aur jab aadad wa shmar main adm mtaabkt ya ghltaywn ko rwknay main mdd mlty hay jab kaladm akdar ki ajazat nahin hawty haay۔ayk mkhsawsa kalm۔ agar kesi kalm main kesi kalm main kesi kalm main kal nah hony wali rkawt kay sath dakhl karnay ki kwshsh ki jati hay tou ، dayta bys ayk ghltay main azuafha kray ga ، aur andraj nakam hawjaiay gha۔ dayfalt rkawt: pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ko pehlay sy taay shuda kymt ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk kalm jab kesi dakhl hony waly aapryshn kay doran koi wazuha kdr fraham nahin ki jati haay۔ jab kesi kalm ki wzuahat pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay sath ki jati hay ، agar kesi dakhl hony waly byan kay doran is kalm kay liye wazuha tawr par koi kdr fraham nahin ki jati hay tou ، rkawt main mtayn pehlay sy taay shuda kymt astamal ki jaye ghy۔ is ki ajazat hawghy۔aap kesi pehlay sy taay shuda kymt ki wzuahat karain ga jo khud bkhwd kalm ko tfwyzu krdy jati hay agar koi dusri kymt fraham nahin ki jati haay۔ pehlay sy taay shuda kymt mstkl kymt ، azahaar ya sstm sy taay shuda fnkshn hawskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، kaladm rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh ayk kalm is bat ko ykyny bnata haay۔NULL akdar ki ajazat nahin dyta hay ، jabky pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kesi pehlay sy taay shuda kymt ki wzuahat krty hay jo astamal ki jati hay jab koi wazuha kymt fraham nahin ki jati haay۔NULL kesi kdr ki mwjwdghy ko nafza nahin krta hay ، jabky dayfalt dayfalt wylyw fraham krta hay jab koi kymt wazuha tawr par nahin di jati haay۔

Question: nyw yark shhar main sab sy zayada mshhawr msanwaat tlash karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، tybl sy dayta ko hatanay kay liye byanat sy trashay janay waly tybl aur hazaf karnay waly dono ko astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf tarykwn sy kam karty hayn: tybl tybl byan: tybl tybl ka byan ayk tybl sy tamam ktaarwn ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh ayk tyza aur mwsar haay۔aapryshn jo tybl sy wabstha dayta kay safhaat ko jldy sy khtm krta hay ، tybl ko mؤsar tarykay sy khaly haalt main dwbarha trtyb dyta haay۔ byan sy hazaf karnay kay baghair ، jo ktaarwn ko ayk ayk krkay hatata hay ، trashnay wali myza ayk hi aapryshn main tamam ktaaryn hataty hay ، js sy yeh tyza aur kam wsail bn jata haay۔jb aap kesi tybl ko chhwta karty hain tou ، tybl ka dahanchha ، asharyha jat aur rkawtyn brkrar rhaty hain ، lekin aadad wa shmar ko hazaf krdya jata haay۔ kesi tybl ko trnkyt karna khtm nahin kya jaskta hay ، aur aapryshn tranzaykshn lagh (kchh dayta bys sstm myn) main lagh un nahin hawta hay ،lhazaa is ko waps nahin kya jaskta۔ aydayshnl tawr par ، trnkyt tybl aam tawr par kesi bhi aatw ankrymntngh shnakhty kalmwn ya trtyb ki akdar ko un ki abtdaiy haalt main dwbarha syt krta haay۔ byan sy byan kryn: byan sy hazaf shuda mkhsawsa ktaarwn sy mkhsawsa ktaarwn ko mkhsawsa haaltwn par mbny tybl sy hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aap ko yeh btanay ki ajazat dyta hay keh jahan shk ko yeh malwm karnay kay liye keh kon sy ktaaryn jdwl sy hazaf krdy jany chahaiyn۔ byan sy hazaf karnay sy ktaarwn ko ayk ayk krkay hata dyta hay ، aur hr saf ko hazaf karnay sy lyn dyn lagh (zayadha tr dayta bys sstm myn) lagh un hawta hay ، js kay amkan kay amkan ki ajazat hawty haay۔aapryshn ko waps krna۔ ghair mnktaa tybl ko ، byan sy hazaf karna ayk sst aapryshn hay ، khasa tawr par bray myzawn kay liye ، kywnkha is main ktaarwn ko anfrady tawr par askyn karna aur hazaf karna shaml haay۔ jab aap ktaar ko hazaf karty hain tou ، tybl dahanchay ، asharyha jat aur rkawtwn ko brkrar rkhtay hayn۔، aur sirf mkhsawsa ktaarwn ko hata diya gaya haay۔ khlasaha main ، trnkyt tybl ayk hi aapryshn main ayk myza sy tamam ktaaryn hatata hay ، tybl ko jldy sy khaly haalt main dwbarha trtyb dyta hay ، jabky shraita ki bnyad par mkhsawsa ktaarwn ko hatata hay ، jo ktaar main kam karnay wali ktaar haay۔trnkyt tybl tyza aur kam wsail sy mtalk hay ، lekin isy waps nahin laya jaskta ، jabky hazaf karnay sy aahastha hay lekin hazaf karnay kay aml par zayada kntrwl fraham krta hay aur tranzaykshnl rwl byk ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: 25 sy 34 sal ki amr kay lwghwn main sab sy zayada mkbwl msanwaat tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، tybl aur darap tybl kay byanat ko baltrtyb tybl bnanay aur darap karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhalf tarykwn sy kam karty hayn: tybl astytmnt bnaiyn: tybl astytmnt ko ayk dayta bys main ayk nya tybl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh tybl ki wzuahat krta haay۔kalmwn aur un kay mtalkha aadad wa shmar ki aksam ، rkawtwn aur dyghr tybl praprtyza ka nam aur is ki wzuahat krta haay۔ jab tybl kay byan par amldraamd karty ho tou ، dayta bys sstm fraham krdha wzuahatwn par mbny ayk nya tybl tyar krta hay ، js main zurwry astwryj ki jghha mkhtsa krty hay aur tybl dahanchay ko trtyb dytay hayn۔tkhlyk tybl ka byan aam tawr par ayk bar tybl ko abtdaiy tawr par trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur is kay bad tybl dahanchay main trmym tybl kay byanat kay zaryaay ki jati haay۔ darap tybl byan: darap tybl ka byan kesi dayta bys sy kesi mwjwdha tybl ko hazaf ya hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔darap tybl byan par aml karty wkt ، dayta bys ka nzaam apnay tamam aadad wa shmar ، asharyha jat ، rkawtwn aur is sy wabstha ashyaa kay sath mkhsawsa jdwl ko mstkl tawr par hazaf krta haay۔ darap tybl ka byan nakabl wapsy hay ، aur ayk bar is par aml draamd kya jata hay ، jab tak keh aap tybl aur is kay dayta ko bazayaft nahin kya jaskta haay۔byk ap rkhyn۔ darap tybl kay byan ko astamal karty wkt ahatyata ka astamal karna zurwry hay kywnkha is kay ntyjay main aadad wa shmar main kami waka hawskty haay۔darap tybl ka byan mwjwdha tybl aur is sy wabstha tamam ashyaa ko dayta bys sy mstkl tawr par hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tkhlyk tybl byan tybl ko trtyb dyta hay ، jabky darap tybl ka byan isy hata dyta haay۔

Question: "an msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn jo un lwghwn main sab sy zayada mkbwl hain jn ki ghhrylw aamdny ، 000 100،000 sy zayada haay۔"
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، dayta bys aur darap dayta bys kay byanat ko baltrtyb dayta bys bnanay aur darap karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhalf tarykwn sy kam karty hayn: dayta bys ka byan bnaiyn: dayta bys kay antzaam kay nzaam main ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dayta bys ka nam pyda karnay kay liay۔ jab dayta bys kay byan ko anjam denay kay bad ، dayta bys mynjmnt sstm mkhsawsa nam kay sath ayk nya dayta bys bnata hay aur zurwry astwryj ki jghha mkhtsa krta haay۔ dayta bys kay byan main dayta bys kay kryktr syt ki wzuahat karnay kay liye azuafy pyramytrza bhi shaml hawsktay hayn۔، kwlyshn ، aur dyghr praprtyza۔ ayk bar dayta bys bnaiay janay kay bad ، aap isy tyblza bnanay ، askyma aabjykt ki wzuahat karnay ، aur dayta ko astwr karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ dayta bys ka byan: darap dayta bys ka byan dayta bys mynjmnt sy mwjwdha dayta bys ko hazaf ya hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔sstm۔ jab darap dayta bys kay byan par aml draamd karty hain tou ، dayta bys mynjmnt sstm apnay tamam jdwlwn ، aaraa ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar aur dyghr dayta bys aabjykt kay sath mkhsawsa dayta bys ko mstkl tawr par hazaf krta haay۔ darap dayta bys ka byan nakabl wapsy hay ، aur ayk bar is par aml draamd ، dayta bys aur is kay tamam tmamwabstha ashyaa ko bazayaft nahin kya jaskta jab tak keh aap kay pas byk ap nah haw۔ darap dayta bys kay byan ko astamal karty wkt ahatyata ka astamal karna zurwry hay kywnkha is kay ntyjay main aadad wa shmar main kami waka hawskty hay agar ghalat astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha main ، tkhlyk dayta bys ka byan ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jbkhadarap dayta bys ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys aur is sy wabstha tamam ashyaa ko mstkl tawr par hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tkhlyk dayta bys ka byan dayta bys ko mrtb krta hay ، jabky darap dayta bys ka byan isy hata dyta haay۔

Question: kalj ki daghry rkhnay waly lwghwn main sab sy zayada mkbwl msanwaat tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، byk ap aur bhaaly kay kamwn kay liye byk ap dayta bys aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byanat ka astamal baltrtyb: byk ap dayta bys byan: byk ap dayta bys ka byan dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aam tawr par byk ap fail ya byk ap syt ki shkl main ya byk ap syt. jab byk ap dayta bys kay byan par aml draamd karty hain tou ، aap ko byk ap lenay kay liye dayta bys ka nam aur is mnzal ki wzuahat ki jati hay jahan byk ap mhafwza kya jaye gha۔ byk ap ko dask ، typ ، ya kesi dusray astwryj mydaym par mhafwza kya jaskta hay jo dayta bys mynjmnt sstm kay zaryaha spwrt kya jata haay۔. byk ap dayta bys ka byan is kay dayta ، askyma ، aur dyghr dayta bys aabjykt smyt poray dayta bys ko apni ghrft main la jata haay۔ yeh dayta bys ka ayk nktaha wkt snyp shat fraham krta hay ، js sy aap byk ap kay wkt isy ryast main bhaal krsktay hayn۔dayta bys ka byan: bhaaly dayta bys kay byan ko pehlay sy bnaiay gaye byk ap sy dayta bys ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab dayta bys kay byan ko bhaal karnay kay bad ، aap dayta bys ka nam bhaal karnay kay liye btatay hain aur js zaryaha sy byk ap haasal kya jaye gha۔byk ap fail ، byk ap syt ، ya byk ap daywais sy haasal kya jaiay۔ dayta bys ka byan bazayaft byk ap ka astamal karty hoey dayta bys ko dwbarha bnata hay ، dayta ، askyma aur dyghr dayta bys aabjykt ko bhaal krta haay۔، ya byk ap daat kam main pkray janay wali pchhly ryast kay liye ، byk ap dayta bys byan ko dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، is kay dayta aur askyma ko apni ghrft main la liya jata hay ، jabky bhaaly dayta bys kay byan ko pehlay sy tyar krdha byk ap sy dayta bys ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔، dayta bys ko dwbarha bnana aur is kay dayta aur askyma ko bhaal krna۔byk ap dayta bys ka byan byk ap tshkyl dyta hay ، jabky bhaaly dayta bys ka byan is byk ap ko dayta bys ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal krta haay۔

Question: un msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn jo shady shuda lwghwn main sab sy zayada mkbwl hayn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، ghrant aur kaladm byanat ko kesi dayta bys kay andr ajazat aur mraaat ka antzaam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhalf tarykwn sy kam karty hayn: ghrant ka byan: ghrant ka byan saarfyn ko mkhsawsa mraaat ya ajazat denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ghrant ka byan ، aap ko dyiay janay waly mraaat ki wzuahat karty hain ، woh saarfyn ya krdar jn ko mraaat deni chahaiyn ، aur woh ashyaa jn par mraaat ka atalak hawta hay (jysay ، myzayn ، aaraa ، tarykha kar)jysa keh mntkhb karain ، dakhl karain ، ap dayt karain ، hazaf karain ، tkhlyk karain ، darap karain ، aur bohat kchh۔ ghrant kay byan sy aap ko yeh kntrwl karnay ki ajazat mlty hay keh saarf ya krdar dayta bys kay andr kon sy aapryshnza aur aabjykt tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔mkhtlf saarfyn ya krdar۔ rywkyt byan: mnswkh karnay wala byan ayk dayta bys main saarfyn ya krdarwn sy pehlay dyiay gaye mraaat ya hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab aap mnswkh hony waly byan par amldraamd karty hain tou ، aap un mraaat ko mnswkh karnay kay liye wazuha karty hain ، jn sy mraaat ya aysay krdar hain jn sy mraaat yaftha hayn۔mnswkh kya jana chahaiay ، aur jn ashyaa sy mraaat ko mnswkh kya jata haay۔ mnswkh karnay wala byan mؤsar tarykay sy saarfyn ya krdarwn sy mkhsawsa mraaat ko door krta hay ، js sy un ki rsaiy aur ashyaa par un ki rsaiy par pabndy aaid hawty haay۔zurwrt kay mtaabk krdar ، kuch aapryshnza ya ashyaa tak rsaiy ko mhadwd karnay ya mnswkh karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krna۔krdar ، un ko mkhsawsa ashyaa par mkhsawsa akdamat karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔mnswkh karnay waly byan ka astamal pehlay dyiay gaye mraaat ko mnswkh karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jo mؤsar tarykay sy kuch akdamat ya ashyaa tak rsaiy ko door krta haay۔ghrant ghrant mraaat dyta hay ، jabky rykwky mraaat ko door krta haay۔

Question: un msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn jo un lwghwn main sab sy zayada mshhawr hain jn kay bchay hayn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، flsh mraaat aur flsh tyblza kay byanat ko mkhtlf aapryshnza anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay: flsh mraaat ka byan: flsh mraaat kay byan ko ghrant tyblza ko dwbarha lwda karnay aur ays kyw ayl srwr main mraaat ko tazaha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh aam tawr par ghrant tyblza main trmym karnay kay bad astamal hawta haay۔braha rast ghrant ، kaladm ، ya dyghr asthakak sy mtalk byanat ka astamal karty hoey ، ya bnyady saarf aur asthakak ki malwmat main tbdyly lanay kay bad۔ jab flsh mraaat kay byan par aml draamd karty hain tou ، ays kyw ayl srwr ghrant tybl ko dask sy dwbarha lwda krta hay ، saarf ki mraaat ko dwbarha tshkyl dyta hay ، aur koi bhi laghw hawta hay ، aur koi bhi laghw hawta haay۔asthakak kay nzaam main ki janay wali tbdylyan۔ yeh byan chlanay waly rabtawn ya faal syshnwn ko mtasar nahin krta haay۔yha sirf bad kay rabtaay ki kwshshwn ko mtasar krta haay۔ flsh tyblza ka byan: flsh tyblza ka byan myzawn ko band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، kesi bhi kyshda dayta ko mؤsar tarykay sy flsh karty hain aur tybl astyts ko dwbarha trtyb dytay hayn۔ yeh aam tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal hawta hay jahan aap is bat ko ykyny bnana chahti hain keh tamam zayr altwaa tbdylyan lkhy hogi hayn۔dask aur is tybl kay talay jary krdyiay jatay hayn۔ jab flsh tyblza kay byan ko amly jamha phananay sy ، ays kyw ayl srwr tamam khly myzayn band krdyta hay ، tamam tbdylywn ko dask par mjbwr krta hay ، aur mwjwdha syshn kay pas mwjwd kesi bhi tybl talay ko jary krta haay۔ yeh byan un maamlat main mfyd saabt hawskta hay jahan aap hawn۔antzaamy kam anjam denay ki zurwrt hay ، jesay dayta bys failwn ki psht pnahay ya kapy krna۔ khlasaha main ، flsh mraaat kay byan ko ghrant tyblza ko dwbarha lwda karnay aur ays kyw ayl srwr main saarf kay mraaat ko tazaha dm karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky flsh tyblza ka byan tybl band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔، kyshda dayta ko flsh karna aur tybl talay jary krna۔flsh mraaat asthakak kay nzaam ko ap dayt krty hain ، jabky flsh tybl tybl ryastwn ko dwbarha syt karty hayn۔

Question: un msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn jo ktay kay malk lwghwn main sab sy zayada mkbwl hayn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، shw tyblza aur tybl kay byanat ko dayta bys main jdwlwn kay baray main malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf ksm ki malwmat fraham karty hayn: tyblza ka byan dkhaiyn: shw tyblza ka byan tyblza ko dayta bys main drj karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab is par aml draamd hawta haay۔tyblza ka byan dkhaiyn ، ays kyw ayl srwr mwjwdha dayta bys main mwjwd tamam jdwlwn kay namwn par mushtamil ntyjha syt lwtata haay۔ yeh un kay dahanchay ya kalmwn kay baray main tfsayly malwmat kay baghair jdwlwn ki fharst ko bazayaft karnay ka ayk tyza tarykha fraham krta haay۔ jab aap ko zurwrt ho tou yeh byan mfyd haay۔ksy dayta bys main mwjwd jdwlwn ka jaizaha dykhnay kay liay۔ tybl byan ki wzuahat kryn: tybl byan ، ya mtbadl tawr par daysk tybl ki wzuahat karain ya kalm dkhaiyn ، kesi khasa jdwl ki sakht aur myta dayta ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab jdwl kay byan ki wzuahat karain ،ays kyw ayl srwr kalm jesay fylda ، taip ، nwl ، klyd ، dayfalt ، aur azuafy kay sath ayk ntyjha syt waps krta hay ، jo mkhsawsa tybl main hr kalm kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔akdar ، kalm ki klyd (jysay ، bnyady klyd ya ghair mlky klyd) ، pehlay sy taay shuda akdar ، aur koi azuafy malwmat۔ yeh byan mfyd hay jab aap kesi khasa jdwl ki sakht ki janch karna chahti hain ، js main kalm kay nam ، dayta ki ksmyn ، aur mkhtlf khsawsayat shaml hayn۔kalmwn main khlasaha ، shw tyblza ka byan ayk dayta bys main tybl kay namwn ki ayk fharst fraham krta hay ، jabky tybl ka byan byan ayk mkhsawsa jdwl kay dahanchay aur myta dayta kay baray main tfsayly malwmat fraham krta hay ، js main kalm kay nam ، dayta ki aksam aur kalm ki khsawsayat shaml hayn۔tyblza ki fharst main tybl kay nam dkhaiyn ، jabky tybl ki wzuahat kalm ki staha ki tfsaylat fraham krty haay۔

Question: un msanwaat ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn jo bly kay malk lwghwn main sab sy zayada mkbwl hayn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، shw kay dayta bys aur astamal dayta bys kay byanat ko dayta bys kay sath taaml kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: dayta bys byan dkhaiyn: shw dayta bys ka byan ays kyw ayl srwr main dstyab tamam dayta bys ki fharst kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab dayta bys kay byan par aml draamd hawta haay۔، ays kyw ayl srwr ayk ntyjha syt lwtata hay js main tamam dayta bys kay nam mwjwd hain jn tak mwjwdha saarf tak rsaiy haasal haay۔ yeh ays kyw ayl srwr main mwjwdha dayta bys ko dykhnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta hay ، baghair kesi khasa dayta bys ko mntkhb karnay ya astamal karnay kay۔ dayta bys ka byan۔astamal kay dayta bys kay byan ko kesi mkhsawsa dayta bys ko mntkhb karnay aur tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js sy bad main hony wali karrwaiywn kay liye mwjwdha faal dayta bys bn jata haay۔ jab astamal dayta bys kay byan par aml draamd karty hain tou ، aap js dayta bys ka astamal karna chahti hain is ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ astamal karain dayta bys ka byan haay۔phansy di hogi ، is kay bad kay tamam ays kyw ayl byanat ko mntkhb krdha dayta bys kay tnazar main aml main laya jaye gha۔ yeh aap ko apnay syshn kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda dayta bys ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، lhazaa aap ko hr bad kay astfsar main dayta bys kay nam ka wazuha tawr par hawalha denay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔ khlasaha۔dayta bys kay byan ko zaahar karain ays kyw ayl srwr main dstyab dayta bys ki fharst hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys ka byan ayk mkhsawsa dayta bys main mntkhb aur swich krta hay ، js sy bad main hony wali karrwaiywn kay liye faal dayta bys bn jata haay۔dkhaiyn dayta bys dayta bys ki ayk fharst fraham krta hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys aap kay syshn kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda dayta bys ka tayn krta haay۔

Question: mchhly kay malk afrad main sab sy zayada mkbwl msanwaat tlash karnay kay liye ayk ays kyw ayl astfsar lkhyn۔
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، shw ghrant aur shw mtghyr kay byanat mkhtlf ksm ki malwmat ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hayn: ghrant ka byan: shw ghrant byan ko maiy ays kyw ayl srwr main kesi mkhsawsa saarf ya krdar ko denay waly asthakak aur ajazatwn ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ghrant ka byan dkhaiyn ، ays kyw ayl srwr ayk aysa ntyjha syt lwtata hay jo ghrant kay ayn mtaabk byanat ko zaahar krta hay jo mkhsawsa saarf ya krdar ko mraaat denay kay liye aml main laya gaya haay۔myzaban ، saarf ، aur mkhtlf dayta bys aabjykt par dyiay gaye mraaat۔ yeh byan mfyd hay jab aap ko ays kyw ayl srwr main kesi khasa saarf ya krdar ko tfwyzu krdha mraaat ka jaizaha lenay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mwjwdha knfyghryshn mtghyrat aur un ki akdar ays kyw ayl srwr myn۔ jab shw mtghyrat kay byan par aml draamd karty hain tou ، ays kyw ayl srwr ayk aysa ntyjha syt lwtata hay js main mkhtlf srwr knfyghryshn mtghyr kay nam aur akdar shaml hawtay hayn۔ yeh ays kyw ayl srwr ki mwjwdha trtybat aur tshkylat kay baray main malwmat fraham krta haay۔mymwry ، astwryj anjn ، nyt wrkngh ، kryktr syt ، aur bohat kuch sy mtalk mtghyrat smyt۔ yeh byan mfyd hay jab aap ko Mysql srwr ki mwjwdha trtyb ki trtybat ki janch pratal karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ayk mkhsawsa saarf ya krdar ، jabky shw mtghyr byan mwjwdha trtyb mtghyrat aur un ki akdar ko ays kyw ayl srwr main dkhata haay۔ghrant dkhaiyn۔
